16583073Di2015UniqueSeparator        WriteableBitmap wb = new WriteableBitmap(this.canvas1,null);Di2015NewLine        Stream sm = GetBase64Image(wb);       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      public static Stream GetBase64Image(WriteableBitmap bitmap)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int width = bitmap.PixelWidth;Di2015NewLine            int height = bitmap.PixelHeight;Di2015NewLine            int bands = 3;Di2015NewLine            byte[][,] raster = new byte[bands][,];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < bands; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                raster[i] = new byte[width, height];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int row = 0; row < height; row++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int column = 0; column < width; column++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int pixel = bitmap.Pixels[width * row + column];Di2015NewLine                    raster[0][column, row] = (byte)(pixel >> 16);Di2015NewLine                    raster[1][column, row] = (byte)(pixel >> 8);Di2015NewLine                    raster[2][column, row] = (byte)pixel;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ColorModel model = new ColorModel { colorspace = ColorSpace.RGB };Di2015NewLine            FluxJpeg.Core.Image img = new FluxJpeg.Core.Image(model, raster);Di2015NewLine            MemoryStream stream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine            JpegEncoder encoder = new JpegEncoder(img, 100, stream);Di2015NewLine            encoder.Encode();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return stream;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

16583911Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Expression<Func<Foo, bool>> GetExpression<T>(Di2015NewLine    int setSize, int[] elements,Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<Foo, T>> property)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var seedProperty = GetPropertyInfo(property);Di2015NewLine    var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(Foo));Di2015NewLine    Expression body = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(var element in elements)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var condition = GetCondition(parameter, seedProperty, setSize, element);Di2015NewLine        if(body == null)Di2015NewLine            body = condition;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            body = Expression.OrElse(body, condition);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(body == null)Di2015NewLine        body = Expression.Constant(false);        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<Foo, bool>>(body, parameter);    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic Expression GetCondition(Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression parameter, PropertyInfo seedProperty,Di2015NewLine    int setSize, int element)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Equal(Di2015NewLine        Expression.Modulo(Expression.Property(parameter, seedProperty),Di2015NewLine                          Expression.Constant(setSize)),Di2015NewLine        Expression.Constant(element));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static PropertyInfo GetPropertyInfo(LambdaExpression propertyExpression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (propertyExpression == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("propertyExpression");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var body = propertyExpression.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine    if (body == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine            string.Format(Di2015NewLine                "'propertyExpression' should be a member expression, "Di2015NewLine                + "but it is a {0}", propertyExpression.Body.GetType()));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var propertyInfo = body.Member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine    if (propertyInfo == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine            string.Format(Di2015NewLine                "The member used in the expression should be a property, "Di2015NewLine                + "but it is a {0}", body.Member.GetType()));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return propertyInfo;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16584094Di2015UniqueSeparator private static Bitmap ImageTrim(Bitmap img)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //get image dataDi2015NewLine            BitmapData bd= img.LockBits(new Rectangle(Point.Empty, img.Size),Di2015NewLine            ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine            int[] rgbValues = new int[img.Height * img.Width];Di2015NewLine            Marshal.Copy(bd.Scan0, rgbValues, 0, rgbValues.Length);Di2015NewLine            img.UnlockBits(bd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            #region determine boundsDi2015NewLine            int left = bd.Width;Di2015NewLine            int top = bd.Height;Di2015NewLine            int right = 0;Di2015NewLine            int bottom = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //determine topDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < rgbValues.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int color = rgbValues[i] & 0xffffff;Di2015NewLine                if (color != 0xffffff)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int r = i / bd.Width;Di2015NewLine                    int c = i % bd.Width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (left > c)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        left = c;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    if (right < c)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        right = c;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    bottom = r;Di2015NewLine                    top = r;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //determine bottomDi2015NewLine            for (int i = rgbValues.Length - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int color = rgbValues[i] & 0xffffff;Di2015NewLine                if (color != 0xffffff)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int r = i / bd.Width;Di2015NewLine                    int c = i % bd.Width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (left > c)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        left = c;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    if (right < c)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        right = c;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    bottom = r;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (bottom > top)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int r = top + 1; r < bottom; r++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //determine leftDi2015NewLine                    for (int c = 0; c < left; c++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        int color = rgbValues[r * bd.Width + c] & 0xffffff;Di2015NewLine                        if (color != 0xffffff)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if (left > c)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                left = c;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //determine rightDi2015NewLine                    for (int c = bd.Width - 1; c > right; c--)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        int color = rgbValues[r * bd.Width + c] & 0xffffff;Di2015NewLine                        if (color != 0xffffff)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if (right < c)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                right = c;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int width = right - left + 1;Di2015NewLine            int height = bottom - top + 1;Di2015NewLine            #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //copy image dataDi2015NewLine            int[] imgData = new int[width * height];Di2015NewLine            for (int r = top; r <= bottom; r++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(rgbValues, r * bd.Width + left, imgData, (r - top) * width, width);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //create new imageDi2015NewLine            Bitmap newImage = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine            BitmapData nbdDi2015NewLine                = newImage.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, width, height),Di2015NewLine                    ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine            Marshal.Copy(imgData, 0, nbd.Scan0, imgData.Length);Di2015NewLine            newImage.UnlockBits(nbd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return newImage;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

16591253Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Extract a thumbnail from the middle (by duration) of a video fileDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="inputFileName">Path to the video file on the local filesystem</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="duration">Duration of the video</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLinepublic Image ExtractThumbnail(string inputFileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(inputFileName))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("inputFileName", "Input file is null");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TimeSpan duration = GetVideoDuration(inputFileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const string framegrabTemplate = @"-i ""{0}"" -frames:v 1 -ss {2:##0.0##} -f image2 {1}";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string framegrabArgs = string.Format(framegrabTemplate, inputFileName, OutputFileName, duration.TotalSeconds / 2);Di2015NewLine    WindowsProcessResult result = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = WindowsProcessUtil.RunProcess(ExePath, framegrabArgs);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        log.Error("Framegrab process failed with exception {0}.", ex);Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (result.ExitCode != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        log.Error("Framegrab process failed with exitCode {0}. Process output:\\r\\n{1}\\r\\nProcess Error: {2}", result.ExitCode, result.StandardOutput, result.StandardError);Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var img = Image.FromFile(OutputFileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Certain video sources (primarily iOS v5 and below) will give you videos rotated to one side with embedded metadata telling you what that rotation isDi2015NewLine    //If you need to deal with that, you can set rotationAngle from that metadata, but that's a whole other issueDi2015NewLine    //Leaving it here for now as an FYIDi2015NewLine    //int rotationAngle = 0;Di2015NewLine    //if (rotationAngle != 0)Di2015NewLine    //{Di2015NewLine    //    if (rotationAngle == 90)Di2015NewLine    //    {Di2015NewLine    //        img.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate90FlipNone);Di2015NewLine    //    }Di2015NewLine    //    else if (rotationAngle == 180)Di2015NewLine    //    {Di2015NewLine    //        img.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);Di2015NewLine    //    }Di2015NewLine    //    else if (rotationAngle == 270)Di2015NewLine    //    {Di2015NewLine    //        img.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate270FlipNone);Di2015NewLine    //    }Di2015NewLine    //}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return img;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static readonly Regex durationRegex = new Regex(@"Duration\\: (?<duration>[\\d\\:\\.]+)", RegexOptions.Compiled | RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture);Di2015NewLineprivate TimeSpan GetVideoDuration(string inputFileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Process getDurationProcess = null;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const string fileInfoTemplate = @"-i ""{0}""";Di2015NewLine        ProcessStartInfo psi = new ProcessStartInfo(ExePath, string.Format(fileInfoTemplate, inputFileName));Di2015NewLine        psi.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLine        psi.RedirectStandardOutput = true;Di2015NewLine        psi.RedirectStandardError = true;Di2015NewLine        psi.CreateNoWindow = true;Di2015NewLine        //psi.WorkingDirectory = Path.GetDirectoryName(ExePath);Di2015NewLine        //psi.EnvironmentVariables["Path"] = psi.EnvironmentVariables["Path"] + ";" + Path.GetDirectoryName(ExePath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        getDurationProcess = new Process();Di2015NewLine        getDurationProcess.StartInfo = psi;Di2015NewLine        getDurationProcess.EnableRaisingEvents = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder processOutput = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder processError = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        getDurationProcess.OutputDataReceived += (o, args) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            processOutput.AppendLine(args.Data);Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        getDurationProcess.ErrorDataReceived += (o, args) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            processError.AppendLine(args.Data);Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        getDurationProcess.Start();Di2015NewLine        getDurationProcess.BeginOutputReadLine();Di2015NewLine        getDurationProcess.BeginErrorReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        getDurationProcess.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Don't do this - ffmpeg errors out because we didn't give it an output fileDi2015NewLine        //if (getDurationProcess.ExitCode != 0)Di2015NewLine        //{Di2015NewLine        //    log.Error("Get video duration process failed with exitCode {0}. Process output:\\r\\n{1}\\r\\nProcess Error: {2}", getDurationProcess.ExitCode, processOutput, processError);Di2015NewLine        //}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Now we need to parse outputDi2015NewLine        #region Sample outputDi2015NewLine        /*Di2015NewLine            ffmpeg version git-N-29946-g27614b1, Copyright (c) 2000-2011 the FFmpeg developersDi2015NewLine            built on May 15 2011 15:07:09 with gcc 4.5.3Di2015NewLine            configuration: --enable-gpl --enable-version3 --enable-memalign-hack --enable-Di2015NewLine        runtime-cpudetect --enable-avisynth --enable-bzlib --enable-frei0r --enable-liboDi2015NewLine        pencore-amrnb --enable-libopencore-amrwb --enable-libfreetype --enable-libgsm --Di2015NewLine 16591253Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class WindowsProcessUtilDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Spawn a Windows process, capture StandardOut and StandardError, and wait for it to completeDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static WindowsProcessResult RunProcess(string exePath, string cmdLineArgs, TimeSpan? timeout = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Process p = null;Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder processOutput = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder processError = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        int exitCode = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ProcessStartInfo psi = new ProcessStartInfo(exePath, cmdLineArgs);Di2015NewLine            psi.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLine            psi.RedirectStandardOutput = true;Di2015NewLine            psi.RedirectStandardError = true;Di2015NewLine            psi.CreateNoWindow = true;Di2015NewLine            psi.WorkingDirectory = Path.GetDirectoryName(exePath);Di2015NewLine            psi.EnvironmentVariables["Path"] = psi.EnvironmentVariables["Path"] + ";" + Path.GetDirectoryName(exePath);Di2015NewLine            psi.LoadUserProfile = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            p = new Process();Di2015NewLine            p.StartInfo = psi;Di2015NewLine            p.EnableRaisingEvents = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            p.OutputDataReceived += (o, args) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                processOutput.AppendLine(args.Data);Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            p.ErrorDataReceived += (o, args) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                processError.AppendLine(args.Data);Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            p.Start();Di2015NewLine            p.BeginOutputReadLine();Di2015NewLine            p.BeginErrorReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (timeout.HasValue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bool processExited = p.WaitForExit((int)timeout.Value.TotalMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine                if (!processExited)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    p.Kill();Di2015NewLine                    throw new TimeoutException("Process did not complete after " + timeout.Value.TotalMilliseconds + " msec");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                p.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            exitCode = p.ExitCode;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (p != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                p.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                p = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new WindowsProcessResult()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ExitCode = exitCode,Di2015NewLine            StandardError = processError.ToString(),Di2015NewLine            StandardOutput = processOutput.ToString()Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class WindowsProcessResultDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int ExitCode { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string StandardOutput { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string StandardError { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16595672Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class WhackAMole : WindowDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public WhackAMole()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DataContext = new WhackAMoleViewModel();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16595672Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class WhackAMoleViewModel: PropertyChangedBaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<Mole> _moles;Di2015NewLine    public List<Mole> MolesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _moles; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private System.Threading.Timer timer;Di2015NewLine    private System.Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public WhackAMoleViewModel()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _moles = Enumerable.Range(1, 9).Select(x => new Mole()).ToList();Di2015NewLine        timer = new Timer(x => RaiseRandomMole(), null, 0, 300);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void RaiseRandomMole()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //If random number is less than 5 skip this iterationDi2015NewLine        if (random.Next(1, 10) > 5)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Choose a random moleDi2015NewLine        var mole = Moles[random.Next(0, 8)];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //If it's already raised, do nothingDi2015NewLine        if (mole.IsUp)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Raise itDi2015NewLine        mole.IsUp = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Then Get it down somewhere between 1 and 2 seconds afterDi2015NewLine        Task.Factory.StartNew(() => Thread.Sleep(random.Next(1000, 2000)))Di2015NewLine                    .ContinueWith(x => mole.IsUp = false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16598843Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PostsConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create an instanceDi2015NewLine    protected IPost Create(JObject jObject)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (PostType("Text", jObject))  return new Text();Di2015NewLine        if (PostType("Video", jObject))  return new Video();Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Error");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var list = new List<IPost>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var arr = JArray.Load(reader);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var item in arr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var obj = JObject.Load(item.CreateReader());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create target object based on JObjectDi2015NewLine            var post = Create(obj);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Populate the object propertiesDi2015NewLine            serializer.Populate(obj.CreateReader(), post);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            list.Add(post);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool PostType(string type, JObject jObject)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return jObject["PostType"] != null && jObject["PostType"].Value<string>() == type;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // I don't need serialize objectDi2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16605259Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var test = new int[] { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var target = 6;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var matches = from subset in test.SubSetsOf()Di2015NewLine                      where subset.Sum() == targetDi2015NewLine                      select subset;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Numbers: {0}", test.Select(i => i.ToString()).Aggregate((a, n) => a + ", " + n));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Target: {0}", target);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var match in matches)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(match.Select(m => m.ToString()).Aggregate((a, n) => a + " + " + n) + " = " + target.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> SubSetsOf<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Deal with the case of an empty source (simply return an enumerable containing a single, empty enumerable)Di2015NewLine        if (!source.Any())Di2015NewLine            return Enumerable.Repeat(Enumerable.Empty<T>(), 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Grab the first element off of the listDi2015NewLine        var element = source.Take(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Recurse, to get all subsets of the source, ignoring the first itemDi2015NewLine        var haveNots = SubSetsOf(source.Skip(1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get all those subsets and add the element we removed to themDi2015NewLine        var haves = haveNots.Select(set => element.Concat(set));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Finally combine the subsets that didn't include the first item, with those that did.Di2015NewLine        return haves.Concat(haveNots);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16606896Di2015UniqueSeparatorPageResult<>
16606896Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic PageResult<WebPoco> Get(ODataQueryOptions<WebPoco> queryOptions)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var data2 = DatabaseData();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Create a set of ODataQueryOptions for the internal classDi2015NewLine    ODataModelBuilder modelBuilder = new ODataConventionModelBuilder();Di2015NewLine    modelBuilder.EntitySet<DatabasePoco>("DatabasePoco"); Di2015NewLine    var context = new ODataQueryContext(Di2015NewLine         modelBuilder.GetEdmModel(), typeof(DatabasePoco));Di2015NewLine    var newOptions = new ODataQueryOptions<DatabasePoco>(context, Request);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var t = new ODataValidationSettings() { MaxTop = 25 };Di2015NewLine    var s = new ODataQuerySettings() { PageSize = 25 };Di2015NewLine    newOptions.Validate(t);Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<DatabasePoco> results =Di2015NewLine        (IEnumerable<DatabasePoco>)newOptions.ApplyTo(data2, s);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int skip = newOptions.Skip == null ? 0 : newOptions.Skip.Value;Di2015NewLine    int take = newOptions.Top == null ? 25 : newOptions.Top.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<DatabasePoco> internalResults = results.Skip(skip).Take(take).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // map from DatabasePoco to WebPoco here:Di2015NewLine    List<WebPoco> webResults; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PageResult<WebPoco> page =Di2015NewLine        new PageResult<WebPoco>(Di2015NewLine            webResults, Request.GetNextPageLink(), Request.GetInlineCount());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return page;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16607315Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyContext : DbContextDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override int SaveChanges()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //you may need this line depending on your exact configurationDi2015NewLine        //ChangeTracker.DetectChanges();Di2015NewLine        foreach (DbEntityEntry o in GetChangedEntries())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IEntity entity = o.Entity as IEntity;Di2015NewLine            entity.LastModified = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return base.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<DbEntityEntry> GetChangedEntries()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new List<DbEntityEntry>(Di2015NewLine            from e in ChangeTracker.Entries()Di2015NewLine            where e.State != System.Data.EntityState.UnchangedDi2015NewLine            select e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16607398Di2015UniqueSeparatorPerson
16607534Di2015UniqueSeparator//Convert number in string representation from base:from to base:to. Di2015NewLine//Return result as a stringDi2015NewLinepublic static String Convert(int from, int to, String s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Return error if input is emptyDi2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(s))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ("Error: Nothing in Input String");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //only allow uppercase input characters in stringDi2015NewLine    s = s.ToUpper();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //only do base 2 to base 36 (digit represented by characters 0-Z)"Di2015NewLine    if (from < 2 || from > 36 || to < 2 || to > 36) Di2015NewLine    { return ("Base requested outside range"); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //convert string to an array of integer digits representing number in base:fromDi2015NewLine    int il = s.Length;Di2015NewLine    int[] fs = new int[il];Di2015NewLine    int k = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = s.Length - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (s[i] >= '0' && s[i] <= '9') { fs[k++] = (int)(s[i] - '0'); }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (s[i] >= 'A' && s[i] <= 'Z') { fs[k++] = 10 + (int)(s[i] - 'A'); }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            { return ("Error: Input string must only contain any of 0-9 or A-Z"); } //only allow 0-9 A-Z charactersDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //check the input for digits that exceed the allowable for base:fromDi2015NewLine    foreach(int i in fs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (i >= from) { return ("Error: Not a valid number for this input base"); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //find how many digits the output needsDi2015NewLine    int ol = il * (from / to+1);Di2015NewLine    int[] ts = new int[ol+10]; //assign accumulation arrayDi2015NewLine    int[] cums = new int[ol+10]; //assign the result arrayDi2015NewLine    ts[0] = 1; //initialize array with number 1 Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //evaluate the outputDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < il; i++) //for each input digitDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < ol; j++) //add the input digit Di2015NewLine            // times (base:to from^i) to the output cumulatorDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cums[j] += ts[j] * fs[i];Di2015NewLine            int temp = cums[j];Di2015NewLine            int rem = 0;Di2015NewLine            int ip = j;Di2015NewLine            do // fix up any remainders in base:toDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                rem = temp / to;Di2015NewLine                cums[ip] = temp-rem*to; ip++;Di2015NewLine                cums[ip] += rem;Di2015NewLine                temp = cums[ip];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            while (temp >=to);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //calculate the next power from^i) in base:to formatDi2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < ol; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ts[j] = ts[j] * from;Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        for(int j=0;j<ol;j++) //check for any remaindersDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int temp = ts[j];Di2015NewLine            int rem = 0;Di2015NewLine            int ip = j;Di2015NewLine            do  //fix up any remaindersDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                rem = temp / to;Di2015NewLine                ts[ip] = temp - rem * to; ip++;Di2015NewLine                ts[ip] += rem;Di2015NewLine                temp = ts[ip];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            while (temp >= to);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //convert the output to string format (digits 0,to-1 converted to 0-Z characters) Di2015NewLine    String sout = String.Empty; //initialize output stringDi2015NewLine    bool first = false; //leading zero flagDi2015NewLine    for (int i = ol ; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (cums[i] != 0) { first = true; }Di2015NewLine        if (!first) { continue; }Di2015NewLine        if (cums[i] < 10) { sout += (char)(cums[i] + '0'); }Di2015NewLine        else { sout += (char)(cums[i] + 'A'-10); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(sout)) { return "0"; } //input was zero, return 0Di2015NewLine    //return the converted stringDi2015NewLine    return sout;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16612711Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static int CompareNumbers(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x.Length > y.Length) y = y.PadLeft(x.Length, '0');Di2015NewLine        else if (y.Length > x.Length) x = x.PadLeft(y.Length, '0');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < x.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (x[i] < y[i]) return -1;Di2015NewLine            if (x[i] > y[i]) return 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16614111Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<string> GetFiles(string folder, string filter)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> files = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // get all of the files in this directoryDi2015NewLine        files.AddRange(Directory.GetFiles(folder, filter));Di2015NewLine        // Now recursively visit the directoriesDi2015NewLine        foreach (var dir in Directory.GetDirectories(folder))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            files.AddRange(GetFiles(dir, filter));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (UnauthorizedAccessException)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // problem accessing this directory.Di2015NewLine        // ignore it and move on.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return files;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16614111Di2015UniqueSeparator    private List<string> GetFiles(string folder, string filter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var files = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // To create a recursive Action, you have to initialize it to null,Di2015NewLine        // and then reassign it. Otherwise the compiler complains that you'reDi2015NewLine        // using an unassigned variable.Di2015NewLine        Action<string> getFilesInDir = null;Di2015NewLine        getFilesInDir = new Action<string>(dir =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // get all the files in this directoryDi2015NewLine                    files.AddRange(Directory.GetFiles(dir, filter));Di2015NewLine                    // and recursively visit the directoriesDi2015NewLine                    foreach (var subdir in Directory.GetDirectories(dir))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        getFilesInDir(subdir);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (UnauthorizedAccessException)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // ignore exceptionDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        getFilesInDir(folder);Di2015NewLine        return files;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16615877Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int twipsPerInch = 1440;Di2015NewLineconst int MM_ISOTROPIC = 7;Di2015NewLineprivate static MemoryStream RasterizePDF(string filePath, int pageIndex, int targetDPI)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Amyuni.PDFCreator.IacDocument doc = new Amyuni.PDFCreator.IacDocument();Di2015NewLine    doc.SetLicenseKey("Evaluation", "07EFC00...77C23E29");Di2015NewLine    FileStream fs = new FileStream(filePath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);     Di2015NewLine    doc.Open(fs, "");Di2015NewLine    //Get the width and height of the target pageDi2015NewLine    Amyuni.PDFCreator.IacPageFormat format = doc.GetPage(pageIndex).GetPageFormat();Di2015NewLine    doc.CurrentPageNumber = pageIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Create ImageDi2015NewLine    Bitmap img = new Bitmap((int)(format.Width * targetDPI / twipsPerInch), (int)(format.Length * targetDPI / twipsPerInch), PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine    Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(img);Di2015NewLine    //set image object background to whiteDi2015NewLine    g.Clear(Color.White);Di2015NewLine    //Get a device context for the grahics objectDi2015NewLine    IntPtr hdc = g.GetHdc();Di2015NewLine    SetMapMode(hdc, MM_ISOTROPIC);Di2015NewLine    // set scaling factorDi2015NewLine    SetWindowExtEx(hdc, twipsPerInch, twipsPerInch, 0);Di2015NewLine    SetViewportExtEx(hdc, targetDPI, targetDPI, 0);Di2015NewLine    //draw the contents of the PDF document on to the graphic contextDi2015NewLine    doc.DrawCurrentPage(hdc, false);Di2015NewLine    //clean upDi2015NewLine    g.ReleaseHdc(hdc);Di2015NewLine    g.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    // Save the bitmap as png into the resulting streamDi2015NewLine    MemoryStream resultStrm = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    img.Save(resultStrm, ImageFormat.Png);Di2015NewLine    //Prepare the stream to be read later onDi2015NewLine    resultStrm.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute("gdi32.dll")]Di2015NewLineprivate static extern int SetMapMode(IntPtr hdc, int MapMode);Di2015NewLine[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute("gdi32.dll")]Di2015NewLineprivate static extern int SetWindowExtEx(IntPtr hdc, int nXExtent, int nYExtent, int not_used);Di2015NewLine[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute("gdi32.dll")]Di2015NewLineprivate static extern int SetViewportExtEx(IntPtr hdc, int nXExtent, int nYExtent, int not_used);Di2015NewLine

16618032Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyCache : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var tmp = conn;Di2015NewLine        conn = null;Di2015NewLine        if (tmp != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tmp.Close(true);Di2015NewLine            tmp.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private RedisConnection conn;Di2015NewLine    private readonly int db;Di2015NewLine    public MyCache(string configuration = "127.0.0.1:6379", int db = 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        conn = ConnectionUtils.Connect(configuration);Di2015NewLine        this.db = db;Di2015NewLine        if (conn == null) throw new ArgumentException("It was not possible to connect to redis", "configuration");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public byte[] Get(string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return conn.Wait(conn.Strings.Get(db, key));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Set(string key, byte[] value, int timeoutSeconds = 60)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        conn.Strings.Set(db, key, value, timeoutSeconds);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16618032Di2015UniqueSeparatormonitor
16618032Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing BookSleeve;Di2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.Caching;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass MyCache : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var tmp0 = conn;Di2015NewLine        conn = null;Di2015NewLine        if (tmp0 != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tmp0.Close(true);Di2015NewLine            tmp0.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var tmp1 = localCache;Di2015NewLine        localCache = null;Di2015NewLine        if (tmp1 != null)Di2015NewLine            tmp1.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var tmp2 = sub;Di2015NewLine        sub = null;Di2015NewLine        if (tmp2 != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tmp2.Close(true);Di2015NewLine            tmp2.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private RedisSubscriberConnection sub;Di2015NewLine    private RedisConnection conn;Di2015NewLine    private readonly int db;Di2015NewLine    private MemoryCache localCache;Di2015NewLine    private readonly string cacheInvalidationChannel;Di2015NewLine    public MyCache(string configuration = "127.0.0.1:6379", int db = 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        conn = ConnectionUtils.Connect(configuration);Di2015NewLine        this.db = db;Di2015NewLine        localCache = new MemoryCache("local:" + db.ToString());Di2015NewLine        if (conn == null) throw new ArgumentException("It was not possible to connect to redis", "configuration");Di2015NewLine        sub = conn.GetOpenSubscriberChannel();Di2015NewLine        cacheInvalidationChannel = db.ToString() + ":inval"; // note that pub/sub is server-wide; useDi2015NewLine                                                             // a channel per DB hereDi2015NewLine        sub.Subscribe(cacheInvalidationChannel, Invalidate);   Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Invalidate(string channel, byte[] payload)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string key = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(payload);Di2015NewLine        var tmp = localCache;Di2015NewLine        if (tmp != null) tmp.Remove(key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static readonly object nix = new object();Di2015NewLine    public byte[] Get(string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // try local, noting the "nix" sentinel valueDi2015NewLine        object found = localCache[key];Di2015NewLine        if (found != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return found == nix ? null : (byte[])found;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // fetch and store locallyDi2015NewLine        byte[] blob = conn.Wait(conn.Strings.Get(db, key));Di2015NewLine        localCache[key] = blob ?? nix;Di2015NewLine        return blob;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Set(string key, byte[] value, int timeoutSeconds = 60, bool broadcastInvalidation = true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        localCache[key] = value;Di2015NewLine        conn.Strings.Set(db, key, value, timeoutSeconds);Di2015NewLine        if (broadcastInvalidation)Di2015NewLine            conn.Publish(cacheInvalidationChannel, key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void ShowResult(MyCache cache0, MyCache cache1, string key, string caption)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(caption);Di2015NewLine        byte[] blob0 = cache0.Get(key), blob1 = cache1.Get(key);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} vs {1}",Di2015NewLine            blob0 == null ? "(null)" : Encoding.UTF8.GetString(blob0),Di2015NewLine            blob1 == null ? "(null)" : Encoding.UTF8.GetString(blob1)Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MyCache cache0 = new MyCache(), cache1 = new MyCache();Di2015NewLine        string someRandomKey = "key" + new Random().Next().ToString();Di2015NewLine        ShowResult(cache0, cache1, someRandomKey, "Initially");Di2015NewLine        cache0.Set(someRandomKey, Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes("hello"));Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(10); // the pub/sub is fast, but not *instant*Di2015NewLine        ShowResult(cache0, cache1, someRandomKey, "Write to 0");Di2015NewLine        cache1.Set(someRandomKey, Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes("world"));Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(10); // the pub/sub is fast, but not *instant*Di2015NewLine        ShowResult(cache0, cache1, someRandomKey, "Write to 1");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16618038Di2015UniqueSeparator{-# LANGUAGE ForeignFunctionInterface #-}Di2015NewLinemodule Foo whereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineimport Foreign.C.StringDi2015NewLineimport Foreign.C.TypesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeign export ccallDi2015NewLine  foo :: CString -> IO CIntDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefoo :: CString -> IO CIntDi2015NewLinefoo c_str = doDi2015NewLine  str    <- peekCString c_strDi2015NewLine  result <- hs_foo str Di2015NewLine return $ fromIntegral resultDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinehs_foo :: String -> IO IntDi2015NewLinehs_foo str = doDi2015NewLine  putStrLn $ "Hello, " ++ strDi2015NewLine  return (length str + 42)Di2015NewLine

 {Di2015NewLine        if (IsRowSelected(rowHandle) == select)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        object row = _view.GetRow(rowHandle);Di2015NewLine        if (select)Di2015NewLine            _selection.Add(row);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            _selection.Remove(row);Di2015NewLine        if (invalidate)Di2015NewLine            Invalidate();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetSelectedIndex(object row)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _selection.IndexOf(row);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void _selection.AddRange(dataSource);  // fastDi2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < _view.DataRowCount; i++)  // slowDi2015NewLine                _selection.Add(_view.GetRow(i));Di2015NewLine        Invalidate();Di2015NewLine        OnSelectionChanged(EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SelectGroup(int rowHandle, bool select)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (IsGroupRowSelected(rowHandle) && select) return;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < _view.GetChildRowCount(rowHandle); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int childRowHandle = _view.GetChildRowHandle(rowHandle, i);Di2015NewLine            if (_view.IsGroupRow(childRowHandle))Di2015NewLine                SelectGroup(childRowHandle, select);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                SelectRow(childRowHandle, select, false);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Invalidate();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SelectRow(int rowHandle, bool select)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SelectRow(rowHandle, select, true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsGroupRowSelected(int rowHandle)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < _view.GetChildRowCount(rowHandle); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int row = _view.GetChildRowHandle(rowHandle, i);Di2015NewLine            if (_view.IsGroupRow(row))Di2015NewLine                if (!IsGroupRowSelected(row))Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    if (!IsRowSelected(row))Di2015NewLine                        return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsRowSelected(int rowHandle)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_view.IsGroupRow(rowHandle))Di2015NewLine            return IsGroupRowSelected(rowHandle);Di2015NewLine        object row = _view.GetRow(rowHandle);Di2015NewLine        return GetSelectedIndex(row) item => SelectRow(item, true));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16622334Di2015UniqueSeparator    Color[,] colorsTable;Di2015NewLine    Bitmap b;Di2015NewLine    Graphics g;Di2015NewLine    int size = 80;  // size of table Di2015NewLine    int pixelWidth = 5; // size of each pixelDi2015NewLine    Random r = new Random();Di2015NewLine    int rand;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // CMDDraw is my Form button which draws the image Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void CMDDraw_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        colorsTable = new Color[size, size];Di2015NewLine        pictureBox1.Size = new Size(size * pixelWidth, size * pixelWidth);Di2015NewLine        b = new Bitmap(size * pixelWidth, size * pixelWidth);Di2015NewLine        g = Graphics.FromImage(b);Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < size; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < size; x++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                rand = r.Next(0, 4);Di2015NewLine                switch (rand)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case 0: colorsTable[x, y] = Color.White; break;Di2015NewLine                    case 1: colorsTable[x, y] = Color.Red; break;Di2015NewLine                    case 2: colorsTable[x, y] = Color.Blue; break;Di2015NewLine                    case 3: colorsTable[x, y] = Color.Lime; break;Di2015NewLine                    default: break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                g.FillRectangle(new SolidBrush(colorsTable[x, y]), x * pixelWidth, y * pixelWidth, pixelWidth, pixelWidth);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        pictureBox1.Image = b;Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine
16622729Di2015UniqueSeparator// Create 8 bit per pixel bitmapDi2015NewLinevar bitmap = new Bitmap(512, 512, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Set grayscale color paletteDi2015NewLinevar colorPalette = bitmap.Palette;Di2015NewLinevar colorEntries = colorPalette.Entries;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor ( int i = 0; i < 256; i++ )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    colorEntries[i] = Color.FromArgb(i, i, i);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Apply changes to color palleteDi2015NewLinebitmap.Palette = colorPalette;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Retrieve bitmap data for efficient writesDi2015NewLinevar bitmapData = bitmap.LockBits(Rectangle.FromLTRB(0, 0, 512, 512), ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Allocate array to store intermediate pixel dataDi2015NewLinebyte[] colorData = new byte[bitmapData.Stride * bitmapData.Height]; // 1 byte per pixel since it is 8bppIndexed formatDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; integers.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int line = i / 512;Di2015NewLine    int position = i % 512;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    colorData[line * bitmapData.Stride + position] = (byte)integers[i]; // color values from fileDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Copy computed pixel data to BitmapDataDi2015NewLineMarshal.Copy(colorData, 0, bitmapData.Scan0, colorData.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebitmap.UnlockBits(bitmapData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebitmap.Save("D:\\\\test.bmp");Di2015NewLine

16625079Di2015UniqueSeparatorCreate FUNCTION [dbo].[ColumnString2]Di2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine    @TableName  As SYSNAME,       --table or view whose column names you wantDi2015NewLine    @Template   As NVarchar(MAX), --replaces '{c}' with the name for every column,Di2015NewLine    @Between    As NVarchar(MAX)  --puts this string between every column stringDi2015NewLine)   Di2015NewLine    RETURNS NVarchar(MAX) ASDi2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine    DECLARE @str As NVarchar(MAX);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SELECT  TOP 999Di2015NewLine        @str = COALESCE(Di2015NewLine                @str + @Between + REPLACE(@Template,N'{c}',COLUMN_NAME), Di2015NewLine                REPLACE(@Template,N'{c}',COLUMN_NAME)Di2015NewLine                        )Di2015NewLine    FROM    INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNSDi2015NewLine    WHERE   TABLE_SCHEMA= COALESCE(PARSENAME(@TableName, 2), N'dbo')Di2015NewLine      And   TABLE_NAME  = PARSENAME(@TableName, 1)Di2015NewLine    ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITIONDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RETURN @str;Di2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLine

16632698Di2015UniqueSeparator// Get the address of the first line.Di2015NewLineIntPtr ptr = bmpData.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Declare an array to hold the bytes of the bitmap. Di2015NewLineint bytes = Math.Abs(bmpData.Stride) * bmp.Height;Di2015NewLinebyte[] rgbValues = new byte[bytes];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Copy the RGB values into the array.Di2015NewLineSystem.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(ptr, rgbValues, 0, bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Set every third value to 255. 16638782Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<Point> MidpointCirclePoints(int x0, int y0, int radius)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int x = radius;Di2015NewLine    int y = 0;Di2015NewLine    int radiusError = 1 - x;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (x >= y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return new Point(x + x0, y + y0);Di2015NewLine        yield return new Point(y + x0, x + y0);Di2015NewLine        yield return new Point(-x + x0, y + y0);Di2015NewLine        yield return new Point(-y + x0, x + y0);Di2015NewLine        yield return new Point(-x + x0, -y + y0);Di2015NewLine        yield return new Point(-y + x0, -x + y0);Di2015NewLine        yield return new Point(x + x0, -y + y0);Di2015NewLine        yield return new Point(y + x0, -x + y0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        y++;Di2015NewLine        if (radiusError < 0)Di2015NewLine            radiusError += 2 * y + 1;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            x--;Di2015NewLine            radiusError += 2 * (y - x) + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16638782Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int size = 256;Di2015NewLine    int radius = 110; // of the square, not of the circlesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var b = new Bitmap(size, size);Di2015NewLine    using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(b))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        g.Clear(Color.White);Di2015NewLine        g.FillPolygon(Brushes.Black, new[]Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new Point(size / 2, size / 2 - 1;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return incircleRadius > 0 && circumcircleRadius > 0;;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIEnumerable<Point> MidpointCirclePoints(int x0, int y0, int radius)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int x = radius;Di2015NewLine    int y = 0;Di2015NewLine    int radiusError = 1 - x;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (x >= y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return new Point(x + x0, y + y0);Di2015NewLine        yield return new Point(y + x0, x + y0);Di2015NewLine        yield return new Point(-x + x0, y + y0);Di2015NewLine        yield return new Point(-y + x0, x + y0);Di2015NewLine        yield return new Point(-x + x0, -y + y0);Di2015NewLine        yield return new Point(-y + x0, -x + y0);Di2015NewLine        yield return new Point(x + x0, -y + y0);Di2015NewLine        yield return new Point(y + x0, -x + y0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        y++;Di2015NewLine        if (radiusError < 0)Di2015NewLine            radiusError += 2 * y + 1;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            x--;Di2015NewLine            radiusError += 2 * (y - 16639567Di2015UniqueSeparatornull
16639567Di2015UniqueSeparatorObjectMerge
16639567Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Creates a new object that contains the properties of the two objects merged together.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">The class type to merge.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="pDefaults">Instance of the defaults object.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="pSettings">Instance of the settings object.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A new instance of T with the merged results.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static T ObjectMerge<T>(T pDefaults, T pSettings, bool pMergeFields = true, bool pMergeProperties = true) where T : class, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T target = new T();Di2015NewLine        Type type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        List<MemberInfo> infos = new List<MemberInfo>(type.GetMembers());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (MemberInfo info in infos)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Copy values from either defaults or settingsDi2015NewLine            if (pMergeFields && info.MemberType == MemberTypes.Field)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                FieldInfo field = (FieldInfo)info;Di2015NewLine                if (field.IsPublic)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    object value = field.GetValue(pSettings);Di2015NewLine                    value = (value == null) ? field.GetValue(pDefaults) : value;Di2015NewLine                    field.SetValue(target, value);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Copy values from either defaults or settingsDi2015NewLine            if (pMergeProperties && info.MemberType == MemberTypes.Property)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                PropertyInfo prop = (PropertyInfo)info;Di2015NewLine                if (prop.CanWrite && prop.CanRead)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    object value = prop.GetValue(pSettings, null);Di2015NewLine                    value = (value == null) ? prop.GetValue(pDefaults, null) : value;Di2015NewLine                    prop.SetValue(target, value, null);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return target;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
16639567Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine///This is a test class for CoreUtilsTest and is intendedDi2015NewLine///to contain all CoreUtilsTest Unit TestsDi2015NewLine///</summary>Di2015NewLine[TestClass()]Di2015NewLinepublic class CoreUtilsTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A class to perform testing on.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class MyClassADi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Param1;Di2015NewLine        public string Param2;Di2015NewLine        public string Param3;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A class to perform testing on.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class MyClassBDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private string _param1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Param1Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _param1; }Di2015NewLine            set { _param1 = value; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private string _param2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Param2Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _param2; }Di2015NewLine            set { _param2 = value; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private string _param3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Param3Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _param3; }Di2015NewLine            set { _param3 = value; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///A test for SetPropertiesDi2015NewLine    ///</summary>Di2015NewLine    [TestMethod()]Di2015NewLine    public void Merging_Fields()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MyClassA defaults = new MyClassA { Param1 = "defaults" };Di2015NewLine        MyClassA settings = new MyClassA { Param2 = "settings" };Di2015NewLine        MyClassA results = CoreUtils.ObjectMerge<MyClassA>(defaults, settings);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual("defaults", results.Param1);Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual("settings", results.Param2);Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual(null, results.Param3);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [TestMethod()]Di2015NewLine    public void Merging_Properties()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MyClassB defaults = new MyClassB { Param1 = "defaults" };Di2015NewLine        MyClassB settings = new MyClassB { Param2 = "settings" };Di2015NewLine        MyClassB results = CoreUtils.ObjectMerge<MyClassB>(defaults, settings);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual("defaults", results.Param1);Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual("settings", results.Param2);Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual(null, results.Param3);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16639951Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<string> GetValues(Type enumType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(!typeof(Enum).IsAssignableFrom(enumType))Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("enumType should describe enum");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var names = Enum.GetNames(enumType).Cast<object>();Di2015NewLine    var values = Enum.GetValues(enumType).Cast<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return names.Zip(values, (name, value) => string.Format("Value {0} Name {1}", value, name))Di2015NewLine                .ToList();     Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16639951Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<string> GetValues(Type enumType)Di2015NewLine{   Di2015NewLine    if(!typeof(Enum).IsAssignableFrom(enumType))Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("enumType should describe enum");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Array names = Enum.GetNames(enumType);Di2015NewLine    Array values = Enum.GetValues(enumType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<string> result = new List<string>(capacity:names.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < names.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result.Add(string.Format("Value {0} Name {1}", Di2015NewLine                                (int)values.GetValue(i), names.GetValue(i)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16641480Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DataTable ToDataTable<T>(this List<T> items)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var tb = new DataTable(typeof(T).Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PropertyInfo[] props = typeof(T).GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(var prop in props)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tb.Columns.Add(prop.Name, prop.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var values = new object[props.Length];Di2015NewLine        for (var i=0; i<props.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            values[i] = props[i].GetValue(item, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        tb.Rows.Add(values);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return tb;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16642649Di2015UniqueSeparator string ToLatinDigits(string nativeDigits)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int n = nativeDigits.Length;Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder latinDigits = new StringBuilder(capacity: n);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (char.IsDigit(nativeDigits, i))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                latinDigits.Append(char.GetNumericValue(nativeDigits, i));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (nativeDigits[i].Equals('.') || nativeDigits[i].Equals('+') || nativeDigits[i].Equals('-'))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                latinDigits.Append(nativeDigits[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("Invalid Argument");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return latinDigits.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16647506Di2015UniqueSeparator   <DataGrid Name="mygrid" ItemsSource="{Binding Items}" AutoGenerateColumns="True" LoadingRow="DataGrid_OnLoadingRow"/>Di2015NewLine
16647506Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void DataGrid_OnLoadingRow(object sender, DataGridRowEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(DispatcherPriority.Render, new Action(() => AlterRow(e)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AlterRow(DataGridRowEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var cell = GetCell(mygrid, e.Row, 1);Di2015NewLine        if (cell == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var item = e.Row.Item as SampleObject;Di2015NewLine        if (item == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var value = item.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (value <= 1) cell.Background = Brushes.Red;Di2015NewLine        else if (value <= 2) cell.Background = Brushes.Yellow;Di2015NewLine        else cell.Background = Brushes.Green;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static DataGridRow GetRow(DataGrid grid, int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var row = grid.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex(index) as DataGridRow;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (row == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // may be virtualized, bring into view and try againDi2015NewLine            grid.ScrollIntoView(grid.Items[index]);Di2015NewLine            row = (DataGridRow)grid.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex(index);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return row;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T GetVisualChild<T>(Visual parent) where T : VisualDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T child = default(T);Di2015NewLine        int numVisuals = VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(parent);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < numVisuals; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var v = (Visual)VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(parent, i);Di2015NewLine            child = v as T ?? GetVisualChild<T>(v);Di2015NewLine            if (child != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return child;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static DataGridCell GetCell(DataGrid host, DataGridRow row, int columnIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (row == null) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var presenter = GetVisualChild<DataGridCellsPresenter>(row);Di2015NewLine        if (presenter == null) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // try to get the cell but it may possibly be virtualizedDi2015NewLine        var cell = (DataGridCell)presenter.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex(columnIndex);Di2015NewLine        if (cell == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // now try to bring into view and retreive the cellDi2015NewLine            host.ScrollIntoView(row, host.Columns[columnIndex]);Di2015NewLine            cell = (DataGridCell)presenter.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex(columnIndex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return cell;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

          Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            fsw.EnableRaisingEvents = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private  void OnChanged(object source, FileSystemEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //  Show that a file has been changedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            WatcherChangeTypes wct = e.ChangeType; 16654553Di2015UniqueSeparator    static Boolean TryParseString<T>(Di2015NewLine        String stringValue, ref T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type typeT = typeof(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (typeT.IsPrimitive)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = (T)Convert.ChangeType(stringValue, typeT);Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (typeT.IsEnum)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = (T)System.Enum.Parse(typeT, stringValue); // Yeah, we're making an assumptionDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var convertible = value as IConvertible;Di2015NewLine            if (convertible != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return convertible.FromString(stringValue);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Raise the [PropertyChanged] eventDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="propertyName">The name of the property</param>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void OnPropertyChanged(string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.PropertyChanged != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.PropertyChanged(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs(propertyName));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, object> propertyValueStorage;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region ConstructorDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NotifyPropertyChangedBase()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.propertyValueStorage = new Dictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Set the value of the property and raise the [PropertyChanged] eventDi2015NewLine    /// (only if the saved value and the new value are not equal)Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">The property type</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="property">The property as a lambda expression</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value">The new value of the property</param>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void SetValue<T>(Expression<Func<T>> property, T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LambdaExpression lambdaExpression = property as LambdaExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (lambdaExpression == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Invalid lambda expression", "Lambda expression return value can't be null");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string propertyName = this.getPropertyName(lambdaExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        T storedValue = this.getValue<T>(propertyName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!object.Equals(storedValue, value))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.propertyValueStorage[propertyName] = value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.OnPropertyChanged(propertyName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary> Get the value of the property </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">The property type</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="property">The property as a lambda expression</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The value of the given property (or the default value)</returns>Di2015NewLine    protected T GetValue<T>(Expression<Func<T>> property)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LambdaExpression lambdaExpression = property as LambdaExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (lambdaExpression == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Invalid lambda expression", "Lambda expression return value can't be null");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string propertyName = this.getPropertyName(lambdaExpression);Di2015NewLine        return getValue<T>(propertyName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Try to get the value from the internal dictionary of the given property nameDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">The property type</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="propertyName">The name of the property</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Retrieve the value from the internal dictionary</returns>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private T getValue<T>(string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (propertyValueStorage.TryGetValue(propertyName, out value))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (T)value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return default(T);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Extract the property name from a lambda expressionDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="lambdaExpression">The lambda expression with the property</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The extracted property name</returns>Di2015NewLine    private string getPropertyName(LambdaExpression lambdaExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MemberExpression memberExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (lambdaExpression.Body is UnaryExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var unaryExpression = lambdaExpression.Body as UnaryExpression;Di2015NewLine            memberExpression = unaryExpression.Operand as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            memberExpression = lambdaExpression.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return memberExpression.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

16660960Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEqualityComparer<int[]>
16660960Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass IntArrayEqualityComparer : IEqualityComparer<int[]>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(int[] x, int[] y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(x, y)) return true;Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(null, x)) return false;Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(null, y)) return false;Di2015NewLine        if (x.Length != y.Length) return false;Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < x.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (x[i] != y[i]) return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(int[] x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x == null) return 0;Di2015NewLine        var hashCode = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < x.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            hashCode = (32 * hashCode) + x[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return hashCode;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16665963Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate const string OPEN_TAG = "!#";Di2015NewLineprivate const string CLOSE_TAG = "#!";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Parse(string s)Di2015NewLine{        Di2015NewLine    int tagOpenIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    int tagCloseIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tagOpenIndex = s.IndexOf(OPEN_TAG);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string tag = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (tagOpenIndex >= 0)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        //Write everything before current tag opening Di2015NewLine        Response.Write(s.Substring(tagCloseIndex, tagOpenIndex));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Find where current tag is closing Di2015NewLine        tagCloseIndex = s.IndexOf(CLOSE_TAG, tagOpenIndex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get tag nameDi2015NewLine        tag = s.Substring(tagOpenIndex, tagCloseIndex - tagOpenIndex + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Parse tag and create asp.net controls. 16666173Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void changeSampleRate(string waveFile, int sampleRate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (waveFile == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* you can add additional input validation code here */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* open for reading */Di2015NewLine    FileStream fs = new FileStream(waveFile, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* get the channel and bits per sample value -> required for calculation */Di2015NewLine    BinaryReader br = new BinaryReader(fs);Di2015NewLine    int length = (int)fs.Length - 8;Di2015NewLine    fs.Position = 22;Di2015NewLine    short channels = br.ReadInt16();Di2015NewLine    fs.Position = 34;Di2015NewLine    short BitsPerSample = br.ReadInt16();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] arrfile = new byte[fs.Length];Di2015NewLine    fs.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine    fs.Read(arrfile, 0, arrfile.Length); /* read entire file */Di2015NewLine    br.Close();Di2015NewLine    fs.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* now open for writing */Di2015NewLine    fs = new FileStream(waveFile, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Write);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BinaryWriter bw = new BinaryWriter(fs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bw.BaseStream.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine    bw.Write(arrfile, 0, 24); //no change till this point Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* refer to waveFormat header */Di2015NewLine    bw.Write(sampleRate);Di2015NewLine    bw.Write((int)(sampleRate * ((BitsPerSample * channels) / 8)));Di2015NewLine    bw.Write((short)((BitsPerSample * channels) / 8));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* you can keep the same data from here */Di2015NewLine    bw.Write(arrfile, 34, arrfile.Length - 34);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bw.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    fs.Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16666369Di2015UniqueSeparatorMergeAll
16666369Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DataTable MergeAll(this IList<DataTable> tables, String primaryKeyColumn)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!tables.Any())Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Tables must not be empty", "tables");Di2015NewLine    if(primaryKeyColumn != null)Di2015NewLine        foreach(DataTable t in tables)Di2015NewLine            if(!t.Columns.Contains(primaryKeyColumn))Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("All tables must have the specified primarykey column " + primaryKeyColumn, "primaryKeyColumn");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(tables.Count == 1)Di2015NewLine        return tables[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DataTable table = new DataTable("TblUnion");Di2015NewLine    table.BeginLoadData(); // Turns off notifications, index maintenance, and constraints while loading dataDi2015NewLine    foreach (DataTable t in tables)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (DataColumn col in t.Columns) Di2015NewLine            col.ReadOnly = false; // this might be required in your caseDi2015NewLine        table.Merge(t); // same as table.Merge(t, false, MissingSchemaAction.Add);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    table.EndLoadData();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (primaryKeyColumn != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // since we might have no real primary keys defined, the rows now might have repeating fieldsDi2015NewLine        // so now we're going to "join" these rows ...Di2015NewLine        var pkGroups = table.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine            .GroupBy(r => r[primaryKeyColumn]);Di2015NewLine        var dupGroups = pkGroups.Where(g => g.Count() > 1);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var grpDup in dupGroups)Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            // use first row and modify itDi2015NewLine            DataRow firstRow = grpDup.First();Di2015NewLine            foreach (DataColumn c in table.Columns)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (firstRow.IsNull(c))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    DataRow firstNotNullRow = grpDup.Skip(1).FirstOrDefault(r => !r.IsNull(c));Di2015NewLine                    if (firstNotNullRow != null)Di2015NewLine                        firstRow[c] = firstNotNullRow[c];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // remove all but first rowDi2015NewLine            var rowsToRemove = grpDup.Skip(1);Di2015NewLine            foreach(DataRow rowToRemove in rowsToRemove)Di2015NewLine                table.Rows.Remove(rowToRemove);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return table;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
