16669570Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DomainServiceExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This method changes the send timeout for the specified Di2015NewLine    /// <see cref="DomainContext"/> to the specifified <see cref="TimeSpan"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="domainContext">Di2015NewLine    /// The <see cref="DomainContext"/> that is to be modified.Di2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="newTimeout">The new timeout value.</param>Di2015NewLine    public static void ChangeTimeout(this DomainContext domainContext, Di2015NewLine                                          TimeSpan newTimeout)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Try to get the channel factory property from the domain client Di2015NewLine        // of the domain context. In case that this property does not existDi2015NewLine        // we throw an invalid operation exception.Di2015NewLine        var channelFactoryProperty = domainContext.DomainClient.GetType().GetProperty("ChannelFactory");Di2015NewLine        if(channelFactoryProperty == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("The 'ChannelFactory' property on the DomainClient does not exist.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Now get the channel factory from the domain client and set theDi2015NewLine        // new timeout to the binding of the service endpoint.Di2015NewLine        var factory = (ChannelFactory)channelFactoryProperty.GetValue(domainContext.DomainClient, null);Di2015NewLine        factory.Endpoint.Binding.SendTimeout = newTimeout;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16671150Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string ResolveClientUrl(string relativeUrl)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (this.DesignMode && this.Page != null && this.Page.Site != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IUrlResolutionService urlResolutionService = (IUrlResolutionService)this.Page.Site.GetService(typeof(IUrlResolutionService));Di2015NewLine        if (urlResolutionService != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return urlResolutionService.ResolveClientUrl(relativeUrl);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (relativeUrl == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("relativeUrl");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    string virtualPathString = VirtualPath.GetVirtualPathString(this.TemplateControlVirtualDirectory);Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(virtualPathString))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return relativeUrl;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    string text = this.Context.Request.ClientBaseDir.VirtualPathString;Di2015NewLine    if (!UrlPath.IsAppRelativePath(relativeUrl))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (StringUtil.EqualsIgnoreCase(text, virtualPathString))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return relativeUrl;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (relativeUrl.Length == 0 || !UrlPath.IsRelativeUrl(relativeUrl))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return relativeUrl;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    string to = UrlPath.Combine(virtualPathString, relativeUrl);Di2015NewLine    text = UrlPath.AppendSlashToPathIfNeeded(text);Di2015NewLine    return HttpUtility.UrlPathEncode(UrlPath.MakeRelative(text, to));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16672361Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RedirectInvalidDomainsAttribute : ActionFilterAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override void OnActionExecuting(ActionExecutingContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var url = filterContext.HttpContext.Request.Url;Di2015NewLine        if (url == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var host = url.Host;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (host.Contains("equispot.com") || host.Contains("localhost")) return;Di2015NewLine        string subdomain = GetSubDomain(host);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Guid guid;Di2015NewLine        if (Guid.TryParseExact(subdomain, "N", out guid)) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // this is a staging domain, it's okayDi2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Invalid domain - 301 redirectDi2015NewLine        UriBuilder builder = new UriBuilder(url) {Host = "www.equispot.com"};Di2015NewLine        filterContext.Result = new RedirectResult(builder.Uri.ToString(), true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This isn't perfect, but it works for the sub-domains Azure providesDi2015NewLine    private static string GetSubDomain(string host)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (host.Split('.').Length > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int index = host.IndexOf(".");Di2015NewLine            return host.Substring(0, index);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         return null;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16680163Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ArtifyModelMetaDataProvider : DataAnnotationsModelMetadataProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static List<Tuple<FieldInfo, FieldInfo>> _fieldsMap;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static ArtifyModelMetaDataProvider()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _fieldsMap = new List<Tuple<FieldInfo, FieldInfo>>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (FieldInfo customFI in GetAllFields(typeof(ArtifyModelMetadata)))Di2015NewLine            foreach (FieldInfo baseFI in GetAllFields(typeof(DataAnnotationsModelMetadata)))Di2015NewLine                if (customFI.Name == baseFI.Name)Di2015NewLine                    _fieldsMap.Add(new Tuple<FieldInfo, FieldInfo>(customFI, baseFI));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static List<FieldInfo> GetAllFields(Type t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<FieldInfo> res = new List<FieldInfo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (t != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (FieldInfo fi in t.GetFields(BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance))Di2015NewLine                if (!fi.IsLiteral)Di2015NewLine                    res.Add(fi);Di2015NewLine            t = t.BaseType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return res;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void CopyToCustomMetadata(ModelMetadata baseMetadata, ArtifyModelMetadata customMetadata)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Tuple<FieldInfo, FieldInfo> t in _fieldsMap)Di2015NewLine            t.Item1.SetValue(customMetadata, t.Item2.GetValue(baseMetadata));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override ModelMetadata CreateMetadata(IEnumerable<Attribute> attributes, Type containerType, Func<object> modelAccessor, Type modelType, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ArtifyModelMetadata modelMetadata = new ArtifyModelMetadata(this, containerType, modelAccessor, modelType, propertyName);Di2015NewLine        CopyToCustomMetadata(base.CreateMetadata(attributes, containerType, modelAccessor, modelType, propertyName), modelMetadata);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ModelMetadataAttribute mma;Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<string, string> htmlAttributes;Di2015NewLine        object tmp;Di2015NewLine        foreach (Attribute a in attributes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            mma = a as ModelMetadataAttribute;Di2015NewLine            if (mma != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                mma.Process(modelMetadata);Di2015NewLine                htmlAttributes = mma.GetAdditionnalHtmlAttributes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (htmlAttributes != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> p in htmlAttributes)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        tmp = null;Di2015NewLine                        tmp = modelMetadata.AdditionnalHtmlAttributes.TryGetValue(p.Key, out tmp);Di2015NewLine                        if (tmp == null)Di2015NewLine                            modelMetadata.AdditionnalHtmlAttributes.Add(p.Key, p.Value);Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                            modelMetadata.AdditionnalHtmlAttributes[p.Key] = tmp.ToString() + " " + p.Value;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (mma is TooltipAttribute)Di2015NewLine                modelMetadata.HasToolTip = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return modelMetadata;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ArtifyModelMetadata : DataAnnotationsModelMetadataDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool HasToolTip { get; internal set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Dictionary<string, modelAccessor, Type modelType, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine        : base(provider, containerType, modelAccessor, modelType, propertyName, null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine 16680163Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class GenericBaseCopy<Src, Dst> where Dst : SrcDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static List<Tuple<FieldInfo, FieldInfo>> _fieldsMap;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static GenericBaseCopy()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _fieldsMap = new List<Tuple<FieldInfo, FieldInfo>>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (FieldInfo customFI in GetAllFields(typeof(Dst)))Di2015NewLine            foreach (FieldInfo baseFI in GetAllFields(typeof(Src)))Di2015NewLine                if (customFI.Name == baseFI.Name)Di2015NewLine                    _fieldsMap.Add(new Tuple<FieldInfo, FieldInfo>(customFI, baseFI));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static List<FieldInfo> GetAllFields(Type t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<FieldInfo> res = new List<FieldInfo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (t != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (FieldInfo fi in t.GetFields(BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance))Di2015NewLine                if (!fi.IsLiteral)Di2015NewLine                    res.Add(fi);Di2015NewLine            t = t.BaseType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return res;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Copy(Src baseClassInstance, Dst dstClassInstance)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Tuple<FieldInfo, FieldInfo> t in _fieldsMap)Di2015NewLine            t.Item1.SetValue(dstClassInstance, t.Item2.GetValue(baseClassInstance));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16683559Di2015UniqueSeparatorIDictionary<string, object>
16683559Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class InstanceCreator {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static public readonly Func<FieldInfo, PropertyInfo, bool> NamingConvention;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static InstanceCreator() {Di2015NewLine        NamingConvention = (f, p) => {Di2015NewLine            var startsWithUnderscope = f.Name.StartsWith("_");Di2015NewLine            var hasSameName = p.Name.Equals(f.Name.Remove(0, 1), StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine            var hasSameType = f.FieldType == p.PropertyType;Di2015NewLine            return startsWithUnderscope && hasSameName && hasSameType &&Di2015NewLine                   f.IsInitOnly && !p.CanWrite;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly Type _type;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Func<IDictionary<string, object>, dynamic> _creator;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public InstanceCreator(Type type) {Di2015NewLine        _type = type;Di2015NewLine        var ctor = GetCtor(type);Di2015NewLine        var propertyToFieldMappers = MakeMappers(type);Di2015NewLine        _creator = MakeCreator(type, ctor, propertyToFieldMappers);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Expression GetCtor(Type type) {Di2015NewLine        if (type == typeof(string)) // ctor for stringDi2015NewLine            return Expression.Lambda<Func<dynamic>>(Di2015NewLine                Expression.Constant(string.Empty));Di2015NewLine        if (type.IsValueType || // type has a parameterless ctorDi2015NewLine            type.GetConstructor(Type.EmptyTypes) != null)Di2015NewLine            return Expression.Lambda<Func<dynamic>>(Expression.New(type));Di2015NewLine        var info = typeof(FormatterServices).GetMethod("GetUninitializedObject");Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Call(info, Expression.Constant(type));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<PropertyToFieldMapper> MakeMappers(Type type) {Di2015NewLine        var properties = type.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public);Di2015NewLine        var fields = type.GetFields(BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLine        var list = from field in fieldsDi2015NewLine                    let property = properties.FirstOrDefault(prop => NamingConvention(field, prop))Di2015NewLine                    where property != nullDi2015NewLine                    select new PropertyToFieldMapper(field, property);Di2015NewLine        return list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Func<IDictionary<string, object>, dynamic> MakeCreator(Di2015NewLine        Type type, Expression ctor,Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<PropertyToFieldMapper> maps) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var list = new List<Expression>();Di2015NewLine        var vList = new List<ParameterExpression>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // creating new targetDi2015NewLine        var targetVariable = Expression.Variable(type, "targetVariable");Di2015NewLine        vList.Add(targetVariable);Di2015NewLine        list.Add(Expression.Assign(targetVariable, Expression.Convert(ctor, type)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // accessing sourceDi2015NewLine        var sourceType = typeof(IDictionary<string, object>);Di2015NewLine        var sourceParameter = Expression.Parameter(sourceType, "sourceParameter");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // calling source ContainsKey(string) methodDi2015NewLine        var containsKeyMethodInfo = sourceType.GetMethod("ContainsKey", new[] { typeof(string) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var accessSourceIndexerProp = sourceType.GetProperty("Item");Di2015NewLine        var accessSourceIndexerInfo = accessSourceIndexerProp.GetGetMethod();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // itrate over writers and add their Call to blockDi2015NewLine        var containsKeyMethodArgument = Expression.Variable(typeof(string), "containsKeyMethodArgument");Di2015NewLine        vList.Add(containsKeyMethodArgument);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var map in maps) {Di2015NewLine            list.Add(Expression.Assign(containsKeyMethodArgument, Expression.Constant(map.Property.Name)));Di2015NewLine            var containsKeyMethodCall = Expression.Call(sourceParameter, containsKeyMethodInfo,Di2015NewLine                                                        new Expression[] { containsKeyMethodArgument });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // creating writerDi2015NewLine            var sourceValue = Expression.Call(sourceParameter, accessSourceIndexerInfo,Di2015NewLine                                              new Expression[] { containsKeyMethodArgument });Di2015NewLine            var setterInfo = map.Field.GetType().GetMethod("SetValue", new[] { typeof(object), typeof(object) });Di2015NewLine            var setterCall = Expression.Call(Expression.Constant(map.Field), setterInfo,Di2015NewLine                new Expression[] {Di2015NewLine                                     Expression.Convert(targetVariable,typeof(object)),Di2015NewLine                                     Expression.Convert(sourceValue,typeof(object))Di2015NewLine                                 });Di2015NewLine            list.Add(Expression.IfThen(containsKeyMethodCall, setterCall));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        list.Add(targetVariable);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var block = Expression.Block(vList, list);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<IDictionary<string, object>, dynamic>>(Di2015NewLine            block, new[] { sourceParameter }Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public dynamic Create(IDictionary<string, object> data) {Di2015NewLine        return _creator.Invoke(data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class PropertyToFieldMapper {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private readonly FieldInfo _field;Di2015NewLine        private readonly PropertyInfo _property;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public PropertyToFieldMapper(FieldInfo field, PropertyInfo property) {Di2015NewLine            _field = field;Di2015NewLine            _property = property;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public FieldInfo Field {Di2015NewLine            get { return _field; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public PropertyInfo Property {Di2015NewLine            get { return _property; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16684476Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic byte[,] Encrypt(byte[,] dataToEncrypt, byte[] givenKey, byte[] initializationVector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //SetupDi2015NewLine        ECB encryptor = new ECB();Di2015NewLine        byte[,] cypherText = new byte[4,4];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //XOR the data with the IVDi2015NewLine        for (int row = 0; row < 4; row++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cypherText[row, 0] = (byte)(dataToEncrypt[row, 0] ^ initializationVector[4 * row]);Di2015NewLine            cypherText[row, 1] = (byte)(dataToEncrypt[row, 1] ^ initializationVector[(4 * row) + 1]);Di2015NewLine            cypherText[row, 2] = (byte)(dataToEncrypt[row, 2] ^ initializationVector[(4 * row) + 2]);Di2015NewLine            cypherText[row, 3] = (byte)(dataToEncrypt[row, 3] ^ initializationVector[(4 * row) + 3]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return encryptor.Encrypt(cypherText, givenKey);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16684567Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class JsonIntegerConverter : JsonConverter {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType) {Di2015NewLine        return objectType == typeof(IDictionary<string, object>);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanWrite {Di2015NewLine        get { return false; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer) {Di2015NewLine        var result = new Dictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLine        reader.Read();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (reader.TokenType == JsonToken.PropertyName) {Di2015NewLine            var propertyName = (string)reader.Value;Di2015NewLine            reader.Read();Di2015NewLine            object value;Di2015NewLine            if (reader.TokenType == JsonToken.Integer) {Di2015NewLine                var temp = Convert.ToInt64(reader.Value);Di2015NewLine                if (temp <= Byte.MaxValue && temp >= Byte.MinValue)Di2015NewLine                    value = Convert.ToByte(reader.Value);Di2015NewLine                else if (temp >= Int16.MinValue && temp <= Int16.MaxValue)Di2015NewLine                    value = Convert.ToInt16(reader.Value);Di2015NewLine                else if (temp >= Int32.MinValue && temp <= Int32.MaxValue)Di2015NewLine                    value = Convert.ToInt32(reader.Value);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    value = temp;Di2015NewLine            } elseDi2015NewLine                value = serializer.Deserialize(reader);Di2015NewLine            result.Add(propertyName, value);Di2015NewLine            reader.Read();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer) {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16689762Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Nameof<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string Property<TProp>(Expression<Func<T, TProp>> expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var body = expression.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(body == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("'expression' should be a member expression");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return body.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16689762Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid BindToDataSource(IEnumerable<MyClass> list) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    myComboBox.DataSource = list;Di2015NewLine    myComboBox.DisplayMember = Nameof<MyClass>.Property(e => e.MyProperty);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16689924Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void ParseSupplierIdWithProducts()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string supplierIdWithProducts = "1_1001,1_1002,20_1003,100_1005,100_1006";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //eg. [0] = "1_1001", [1] = "1_1002", etcDi2015NewLine        List<string> supplierIdAndProductsListSeparatedByUnderscore = supplierIdWithProducts.Split(',').ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //this will be the placeholder for each product ID with multiple products in themDi2015NewLine        //eg. [0] = key:"1", value(s):["1001", "1002"]Di2015NewLine        //    [1] = key:"20", value(s):["1003"]Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<string, List<string>> supplierIdWithProductsDict = new Dictionary<string, List<string>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string s in supplierIdAndProductsListSeparatedByUnderscore)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string key = s.Split('_')[0];Di2015NewLine            string value = s.Split('_')[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            List<string> val = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //look if the supplier ID is presentDi2015NewLine            if (supplierIdWithProductsDict.TryGetValue(key, out val))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (val == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //the supplier ID is present but the values are nullDi2015NewLine                    supplierIdWithProductsDict[key] = new List<string> { value };Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    supplierIdWithProductsDict[key].Add(value);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //that supplier ID is not present, add it and the value/productDi2015NewLine                supplierIdWithProductsDict.Add(key, new List<string> { value });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16692229Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace FooWrapperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static List<Foo> list = new List<Foo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static FooWrapper FindItem(int id)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new FooWrapper(list.Where(o => o.PrimaryKey == id));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list.Add(new FooA() { PrimaryKey = 1, Title = "aaa" });Di2015NewLine            list.Add(new FooB() { PrimaryKey = 1, Age = 123 });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // test the implicit cast to Foo type. this prefers the FooA type.Di2015NewLine            Foo item = FindItem(1);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(item.PrimaryKey + " - " + item.GetType().Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // retrieve the FooWrapper and cast it to FooA type.Di2015NewLine            var itema = (FooA)FindItem(1);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(itema.PrimaryKey + " - " + itema.Title + " - " + itema.GetType().Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // retrieve the FooWrapper and cast it to FooB type. The wrapper instance Di2015NewLine            // retrieved is the same, but the cast retrieves the correct typeDi2015NewLine            var itemb = (FooB)FindItem(1);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(itemb.PrimaryKey + " - " + itemb.Age + " - " + itemb.GetType().Name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public sealed class FooWrapperDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private FooA _a;Di2015NewLine        private FooB _b;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public FooWrapper(IEnumerable<Foo> items)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FooA a;Di2015NewLine            FooB b;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var i in items)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                a = i as FooA;Di2015NewLine                if (a != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this._a = a;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    b = i as FooB;Di2015NewLine                    if (b != null)Di2015NewLine                        this._b = b;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static implicit operator Foo(FooWrapper obj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return obj._a == null ? (Foo)obj._b : obj._a;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static explicit operator FooA(FooWrapper obj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return obj._a;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static explicit operator FooB(FooWrapper obj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return obj._b;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public abstract class FooDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int PrimaryKey { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class FooA : FooDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Title { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class FooB : FooDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Age { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16695080Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Test()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  SqlCeConnection conn = new SqlCeConnection(@"Data Source=/Application/Database.sdf;");Di2015NewLine  tryDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    conn.Open();Di2015NewLine    label1.text = "Connection!";Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  catch (SqlCeException ee)  // <- Notice the use of SqlCeException to read your errorsDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    SqlCeErrorCollection errorCollection = ee.Errors;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder bld = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    Exception inner = e.InnerException;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (null != inner) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      MessageBox.Show("Inner Exception: " + inner.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Enumerate the errors to a message box.Di2015NewLine    foreach (SqlCeError err in errorCollection) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      bld.Append("\\n Error Code: " + err.HResult.ToString("X")); Di2015NewLine      bld.Append("\\n Message   : " + err.Message);Di2015NewLine      bld.Append("\\n Minor Err.: " + err.NativeError);Di2015NewLine      bld.Append("\\n Source    : " + err.Source);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Enumerate each numeric parameter for the error.Di2015NewLine      foreach (int numPar in err.NumericErrorParameters) Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        if (0 != numPar) bld.Append("\\n Num. Par. : " + numPar);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Enumerate each string parameter for the error.Di2015NewLine      foreach (string errPar in err.ErrorParameters) Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        if (String.Empty != errPar) bld.Append("\\n Err. Par. : " + errPar);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    label1.text = bld.ToString();Di2015NewLine    bld.Remove(0, bld.Length);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16700783Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<Tuple<T, T>> WithNext<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var iterator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(!iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        T previous = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLine        while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return Tuple.Create(previous, iterator.Current);Di2015NewLine            previous = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        yield return Tuple.Create(previous, default(T));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16710010Di2015UniqueSeparator// The query returns also the Variant column from the databaseDi2015NewLine// The column is needed to identify the corresponding row to update on the datagridviewDi2015NewLine// Also I am supposing that the variant column is from the same table (JOIN required otherwise)Di2015NewLinestring query = @"SELECT variant, quantity Di2015NewLine                FROM tblOrder_ProductsDi2015NewLine                WHERE order_ID=@ID";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinecon.Open();Di2015NewLineusing (MySqlCommand cmd = new MySqlCommand(query, con))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue("@ID", txtboxID.Text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Cannot use a ExecuteScalar, we need a SqlDataReader to loop over the resultsDi2015NewLine    SqlDataReader reader = cmd.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLine    while(reader.Read())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int quantity = reader.GetInt32(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Now I am supposing the the Variant column is of string type, change the Get Di2015NewLine        // accordingly if it is not Di2015NewLine        string v = reader.GetString(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Use the value retrieved from the database to identify the row to updateDi2015NewLine        DataGridViewRow row = grid.RowsDi2015NewLine                             .Cast<DataGridViewRow>()Di2015NewLine                             .Where(r => r.Cells["variant"].Value.ToString().Equals(v))Di2015NewLine                             .First();Di2015NewLine        row.Cells["Quantity"].Value = quantity;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16718402Di2015UniqueSeparatorALTER PROCEDURE dbo.sp_generateNewRequestIdDi2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine@Customer varchar(50),Di2015NewLine@Network_Type varchar(25),Di2015NewLine@Market_Name varchar(50),Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine@NewRequestId varchar(50) OUTPUTDi2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineBeginDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDeclare @MarketCode as varchar(10);Di2015NewLineDeclare @CustomerPrefix as varchar(10);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET @MarketCode = (select Market_Code from Customer_Market_Details where Customer =     @Customer and Network_Type = @Network_Type and Market_Name = @Market_Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET @CustomerPrefix = (select Customer_Prefix from Customer_Market_Details where Customer = @Customer and Network_Type = @Network_Type and Market_Name = @Market_Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDeclare @RequestIDPrefix as varchar(20);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET @RequestIdPrefix =  @CustomerPrefix + @MarketCode + '_';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- Count how many requests you already have with the same request ID Prefix.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDeclare @RequestCount as int;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET @RequestCount = (Select count (*) from request_details where request_id like   @RequestIdPrefix + '%');Di2015NewLineSET @NewRequestId = @RequestIdPrefix + CAST ((@RequestCount + 1) AS varchar);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineWhile (Exists (Select * from request_details where request_id = @NewRequestId ) )Di2015NewLineBeginDi2015NewLineSET @RequestCount = @RequestCount + 1;Di2015NewLineSET @NewRequestId = @RequestIdPrefix + CAST ((@RequestCount + 1) AS varchar);Di2015NewLineendDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLine

16719972Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Bitmap resizeBitMapImage1(String filePath, int targetWidth,Di2015NewLine        int targetHeight) {Di2015NewLine    Bitmap bitMapImage = null;Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        Options options = new Options();Di2015NewLine        options.inJustDecodeBounds = true;Di2015NewLine        BitmapFactory.decodeFile(filePath, options);Di2015NewLine        double sampleSize = 0;Di2015NewLine        Boolean scaleByHeight = Math.abs(options.outHeight - targetHeight) >= MathDi2015NewLine                .abs(options.outWidth - targetWidth);Di2015NewLine        if (options.outHeight * options.outWidth * 2 >= 1638) {Di2015NewLine            sampleSize = scaleByHeight ? options.outHeight / targetHeightDi2015NewLine                    : options.outWidth / targetWidth;Di2015NewLine            sampleSize = (int) Math.pow(2d,Di2015NewLine                    Math.floor(Math.log(sampleSize) / Math.log(2d)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        options.inJustDecodeBounds = false;Di2015NewLine        options.inTempStorage = new byte[128];Di2015NewLine        while (true) {Di2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                options.inSampleSize = (int) sampleSize;Di2015NewLine                bitMapImage = BitmapFactory.decodeFile(filePath, options);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            } catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine                try {Di2015NewLine                    sampleSize = sampleSize * 2;Di2015NewLine                } catch (Exception ex1) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return bitMapImage;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16720979Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic int Count(Tree tree)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (tree.IsEmpty) Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    return 1 + Count(tree.Left) + Count(tree.Right);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16720979Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic int Count(Tree tree)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int total = 0;Di2015NewLine    Tree current = tree;Di2015NewLine    if (current.IsEmpty) Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    total += 1;Di2015NewLine    int countLeft = Count(current.Left);Di2015NewLine    total += countLeft;Di2015NewLine    current = current.Right;Di2015NewLine    int countRight = Count(current);Di2015NewLine    total += countRight;Di2015NewLine    return total;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16720979Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic int Count(Tree tree)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int total = 0;Di2015NewLine    Tree current = tree;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine Restart:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (current.IsEmpty) Di2015NewLine        return total;Di2015NewLine    int countLeft = Count(current.Left);Di2015NewLine    total += 1;Di2015NewLine    total += countLeft;Di2015NewLine    current = current.Right;Di2015NewLine    goto Restart;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16724905Di2015UniqueSeparator //create delivered recordsDi2015NewLine if (bounced.TryGetValue(sentEmail.email, out bounces))Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine      //there was a bounce! find out if it was within 4 days after the send!Di2015NewLine      foreach (event_data bounce in bounces)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine           if (bounce.event_date > sentEmail.event_date &&Di2015NewLine               bounce.event_date <= sentEmail.event_date.AddDays(4))Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine               matchedBounce = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               //remove the record because a bounce can only match once back to a sendDi2015NewLine               bounces.Remove(bounce);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               if(bounces.Count == 0) //no more bounces for this emailDi2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                    bounced.Remove(sentEmail.email);Di2015NewLine               }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               break;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     if (matchedBounce == false) //no matching bounces in the list!Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine          //if sent is not bounced, it's deliveredDi2015NewLine          deliveredEmail.sid = siteid;Di2015NewLine          deliveredEmail.mlid = mlid;Di2015NewLine          deliveredEmail.mid = mid;Di2015NewLine          deliveredEmail.email = sentEmail.email;Di2015NewLine          deliveredEmail.event_date = sentEmail.event_date;Di2015NewLine          deliveredEmail.event_status = "Delivered";Di2015NewLine          deliveredEmail.event_type = "Delivered";Di2015NewLine          deliveredEmail.id = sentEmail.id;Di2015NewLine          deliveredEmail.number = sentEmail.number;Di2015NewLine          deliveredEmail.laststoretransaction = sentEmail.laststoretransaction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          delivered.Add(deliveredEmail);   //add the new deliveredDi2015NewLine          deliveredEmail = new event_data();Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine elseDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine      //if sent is not bounced, it's deliveredDi2015NewLine      deliveredEmail.sid = siteid;Di2015NewLine      deliveredEmail.mlid = mlid;Di2015NewLine      deliveredEmail.mid = mid;Di2015NewLine      deliveredEmail.email = sentEmail.email;Di2015NewLine      deliveredEmail.event_date = sentEmail.event_date;Di2015NewLine      deliveredEmail.event_status = "Delivered";Di2015NewLine      deliveredEmail.event_type = "Delivered";Di2015NewLine      deliveredEmail.id = sentEmail.id;Di2015NewLine      deliveredEmail.number = sentEmail.number;Di2015NewLine      deliveredEmail.laststoretransaction = sentEmail.laststoretransaction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      delivered.Add(deliveredEmail); {Di2015NewLine        private static readonly DependencyProperty ColumnBinderProperty = DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached("ColumnBinder", typeof(ColumnBinder), ItemProperty collection to DataGridColumn collection.Di2015NewLine        // It derives from TypeConverter so it can access SimplePropertyDescriptor class which base class (PropertyDescriptor) is used in DataGrid.GenerateColumns method to inspect if property is read-only.Di2015NewLine        // It must be stored in DataGrid (via ColumnBinderProperty attached dependency property) because previous binder must be disposed (CollectionChanged handler must be removed from event), otherwise memory-leak might occur.Di2015NewLine        private class ColumnBinder : TypeConverter, IDisposableDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            private readonly Dispatcher dispatcher;Di2015NewLine            private readonly ObservableCollection<DataGridColumn> columns;Di2015NewLine            private readonly ObservableCollection<ItemProperty> itemProperties;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public ColumnBinder(Dispatcher dispatcher, ObservableCollection<DataGridColumn> columns, ObservableCollection<ItemProperty> itemProperties)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.dispatcher = dispatcher;Di2015NewLine                this.columns = columns;Di2015NewLine                this.itemProperties = itemProperties;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                this.Reset();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                this.itemProperties.CollectionChanged += this.OnItemPropertiesCollectionChanged;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private void Reset()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.columns.Clear();Di2015NewLine                foreach (var column in GenerateColumns(itemProperties))Di2015NewLine                    this.columns.Add(column);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private static IEnumerable<DataGridColumn> GenerateColumns(IEnumerable<ItemProperty> itemProperties)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return DataGrid.GenerateColumns(new ItemProperties(itemProperties));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private void OnItemPropertiesCollectionChanged(object sender, NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // CollectionChanged is handled in WPF's Dispatcher thread.Di2015NewLine                this.dispatcher.Invoke(new Action(() =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    switch (e.Action)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add:Di2015NewLine                            int index = e.NewStartingIndex >= 0 ? e.NewStartingIndex : this.columns.Count;Di2015NewLine                            foreach (var column in GenerateColumns(e.NewItems.Cast<ItemProperty>()))Di2015NewLine                                this.columns.Insert(index++, column);Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove:Di2015NewLine                            if (e.OldStartingIndex >= 0)Di2015NewLine                                for (int i = 0; i < e.OldItems.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine                                    this.columns.RemoveAt(e.OldStartingIndex);Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                                this.Reset();Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace:Di2015NewLine                            if (e.OldStartingIndex >= 0)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                index = e.OldStartingIndex;Di2015NewLine                                foreach (var column in GenerateColumns(e.NewItems.Cast<ItemProperty>()))Di2015NewLine                                    this.columns[index++] = column;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                                this.Reset();Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset:Di2015NewLine                            this.Reset();Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.itemProperties.CollectionChanged -= this.OnItemPropertiesCollectionChanged;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Used in DataGrid.GenerateColumns method so that .NET takes care of generating columns from properties.Di2015NewLine            private class ItemProperties : IItemPropertiesDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                private readonly ReadOnlyCollection<ItemPropertyInfo> itemProperties;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                public ItemProperties(IEnumerable<ItemProperty> itemProperties)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.itemProperties = new ReadOnlyCollection<ItemPropertyInfo>(itemProperties.Select(itemProperty => new ItemPropertyInfo(itemProperty.Name, itemProperty.PropertyType, new ItemPropertyDescriptor(itemProperty.Name, itemProperty.PropertyType, itemProperty.IsReadOnly))).ToArray());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                ReadOnlyCollection<ItemPropertyInfo> IItemProperties.ItemPropertiesDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    get { return this.itemProperties; }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                private class ItemPropertyDescriptor : SimplePropertyDescriptorDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    public ItemPropertyDescriptor(string name, Type propertyType, bool isReadOnly)Di2015NewLine                        : base(null, name, propertyType, new Attribute[] { isReadOnly ? ReadOnlyAttribute.Yes : ReadOnlyAttribute.No })Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    public override object GetValue(object component)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    public override void SetValue(object component, object value)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16730956Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IQueryable<T> WhereExistsOrAll<T>(this IQueryable<T> source, string propertyName, int value)Di2015NewLine        where T: // is what?Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (value == 0)Di2015NewLine    return source;Di2015NewLine    var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "m");Di2015NewLine    Expression member = parameter;Di2015NewLine    member = Expression.Property(member, propertyName);Di2015NewLine    member = Expression.Equals(member, Expression.Constant(value));Di2015NewLine    var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(member, new[]{parameter});Di2015NewLine    return source.Where(lambda);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16730956Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IQueryable<T> GetAllOrRestrict<T>(this IQueryable<T> queryable, Expression<Func<T, bool>> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine       var expression = predicate.Body as BinaryExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       var rightPart = expression.Right as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine       var value = GetValue(rightPart);Di2015NewLine       var test = value.ToString();Di2015NewLine       int val;Di2015NewLine       if (Int32.TryParse(value.ToString(), out val))Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           if (val != 0)Di2015NewLine               return queryable.Where(predicate);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       return queryable;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static object GetValue(MemberExpression member)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     var objectMember = Expression.Convert(member, typeof(object));Di2015NewLine     var getterLambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<object>>(objectMember);Di2015NewLine     var getter = getterLambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine     return getter();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16738119Di2015UniqueSeparatorfor each pair of points (p1, p2):Di2015NewLine    let d be the distance vector (x and y) between themDi2015NewLine    if d.x > (image.width-p1.x)/3 or d.y > (image.height-p1.y)/3:Di2015NewLine        continueDi2015NewLine    let d_t be d turned 90 degrees (d.y, -d.x)Di2015NewLine    for i from 0 to 3:Di2015NewLine        for j from 0 to 3:Di2015NewLine            if there is no point at p1 + i*d + j*d_t:Di2015NewLine                continue outer loopDi2015NewLine    if you get here, you have a 4*4 gridDi2015NewLine

16740316Di2015UniqueSeparatorDeque leastSet = new LinkedList(); // use a Deque instead of a Set because order is important, and presumably your inputArray doesn't contain duplicates anyway; if the input may contain duplicates, then use a LinkedHashSet insteadDi2015NewLineDeque currentSet = new LinkedList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// initialize deques with first N elementsDi2015NewLinefor(int i = 0; i < N; i++) {Di2015NewLine    leastSet.addLast(inputArray[i]);Di2015NewLine    currentSet.addLast(inputArray[i]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor(int i = N; i < inputArray.length; i++) {Di2015NewLine    currentSet.removeFirst();Di2015NewLine    currentSet.addLast(inputArray[i]);Di2015NewLine    if((currentSet.peekLast() - currentSet.peekFirst()) < (leastSet.peekLast() - leastSet.peekFirst())) {Di2015NewLine        leastSet = currentSet.clone();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16744114Di2015UniqueSeparatorprecondition
16744114Di2015UniqueSeparatortransform
16744114Di2015UniqueSeparatorpostcondition
16744114Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class AtomicHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void LongTransaction(Di2015NewLine        object obj,Di2015NewLine        TimeSpan pollInterval,Di2015NewLine        ref long value,Di2015NewLine        Func<long, bool> precondition,Di2015NewLine        Func<long, long> transform,Di2015NewLine        Func<long, bool> postcondition)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var oldValue = Interlocked.Read(ref value);Di2015NewLine            if (precondition != null && !precondition(oldValue))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Wait(obj, pollInterval);Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var newValue = transform(oldValue);Di2015NewLine            if (postcondition != null && !postcondition(newValue))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Wait(obj, pollInterval);Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref value, newValue, oldValue) == oldValue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Monitor.PulseAll(obj);Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16744114Di2015UniqueSeparatorlong n = 10;Di2015NewLineobject obj = new object();Di2015NewLine//On many different threads, run this concurrently:Di2015NewLineAtomicHelper.LongTransaction(Di2015NewLine    obj,Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1),Di2015NewLine    ref n,Di2015NewLine    null,Di2015NewLine    x => x - 1,Di2015NewLine    x => x >= 0);Di2015NewLineThread.Sleep(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(3));Di2015NewLineAtomicHelper.LongTransaction(Di2015NewLine    obj,Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan.Zero,Di2015NewLine    ref n,Di2015NewLine    null,Di2015NewLine    x => x + 1,Di2015NewLine    null);Di2015NewLine

16746836Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ApplicationPresenterWindowsDispatcherDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private DateTime started;Di2015NewLine    public Project Project { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Stuff necessary for this solution */Di2015NewLine    private delegate void ComputationDelegate();Di2015NewLine    private object Mutex = new object();Di2015NewLine    private bool IsValid = true;Di2015NewLine    private DateTime LastInvalidated;Di2015NewLine    private Task ObservationTask;Di2015NewLine    private Dispatcher MainThreadDispatcher;Di2015NewLine    private CancellationTokenSource TokenSource;Di2015NewLine    private CancellationToken Token;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ObserveAndTriggerComputation(CancellationToken ctoken)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ctoken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested();Di2015NewLine            lock (Mutex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!IsValid && (DateTime.Now - LastInvalidated).TotalSeconds > 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    IsValid = true;Di2015NewLine                    ComputationDelegate compute = new ComputationDelegate(UpdateProject);Di2015NewLine                    MainThreadDispatcher.BeginInvoke(compute);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ApplicationPresenterWindowsDispatcher()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create the project and subscribe to the invalidation eventDi2015NewLine        Project = new Project();Di2015NewLine        Project.Invalidated += Project_Invalidated;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set up observation taskDi2015NewLine        MainThreadDispatcher = Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher;Di2015NewLine        Mutex = new object();Di2015NewLine        TokenSource = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine        Token = TokenSource.Token;Di2015NewLine        ObservationTask = Task.Factory.StartNew(() => ObserveAndTriggerComputation(Token), Token);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Simulate the user doing stuffDi2015NewLine        started = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        Project.SimulateUserDoingStuff();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Project_Invalidated()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (Mutex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IsValid = false;Di2015NewLine            LastInvalidated = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void UpdateProject()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(string.Format("Running HeftyComputation() at {0}s", (DateTime.Now - started).TotalSeconds));Di2015NewLine        Project.HeftyComputation();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16746836Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ApplicationPresenterRXDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private DateTime started;Di2015NewLine    public Project Project { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ApplicationPresenterRX()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create the project and subscribe to the invalidation eventDi2015NewLine        Project = new Project();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var invalidations = Observable.FromEvent(ev => { this.Project.Invalidated += () => ev(); },Di2015NewLine                                                 ev => { this.Project.Invalidated -= () => ev(); });Di2015NewLine        var throttledInvalidations = invalidations.Throttle(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1));Di2015NewLine        throttledInvalidations.Subscribe(e => { UpdateProject(); });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Simulate the user doing stuffDi2015NewLine        started = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        Project.SimulateUserDoingStuff();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void UpdateProject()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(string.Format("Running HeftyComputation() at {0}s", (DateTime.Now - started).TotalSeconds));Di2015NewLine        Project.HeftyComputation();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16747813Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class HashProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Computes the SHA1 hash from the given string.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="stringToHash">The string to hash.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string GetSHA1Hash(string stringToHash)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var data = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(stringToHash);Di2015NewLine        var hashData = new SHA1CryptoServiceProvider().ComputeHash(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return String.Concat(hashData.Select(b => b.ToString("X2")));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Computes the SHA1 hash from the given string, and then encodes the hash as a Base64 string.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="stringToHash">The string to hash.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string GetSHA1toBase64Hash(string stringToHash)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var data = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(stringToHash);Di2015NewLine        var hashData = new SHA1CryptoServiceProvider().ComputeHash(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Convert.ToBase64String(hashData);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16748525Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Looper()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int i = 0;Di2015NewLine        int AttemptCount = 1;Di2015NewLine        while (i == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TcpListener tL = new TcpListener(Network.GetLocalIPAddress(), 56009);Di2015NewLine                tL.Start(10);Di2015NewLine                Socket tS = tL.AcceptSocket();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (tS.Connected)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    NetworkStream nS = new NetworkStream(tS);Di2015NewLine                    StreamReader Reader = new StreamReader(nS);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Output = Reader.ReadToEnd().Trim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Reader.Close();Di2015NewLine                    nS.Close();Di2015NewLine                    tS.Close();Di2015NewLine                    tL.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //If Done, End ExecutionDi2015NewLine                    i = 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    MessageBox.Show("The connection to the client is broken or failed..!!\\n\\nPlease check connection and try again.","Error",MessageBoxButtons.OK,MessageBoxIcon.Error);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (SystemException ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //If Not, Loop Execution AgainDi2015NewLine                if (MessageBox.Show("Exception: " + ex.Message + "\\n\\nAttempt Count: " + AttemptCount + "\\n\\nDo you want to terminate the transmission?", "Error", MessageBoxButtons.YesNo, MessageBoxIcon.Error) == DialogResult.Yes)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    i = 1;Di2015NewLine                    ResetTimer.Stop();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    i = 0;Di2015NewLine                    AttemptCount++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16751309Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MakeRequest();       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static async void MakeRequest()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        await UseHttpClient();Di2015NewLine        UseWebClient();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static async Task UseHttpClient()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("=== HttpClient ==");Di2015NewLine        var client = new HttpClient();Di2015NewLine        var request = new HttpRequestMessage(HttpMethod.Get, new Uri("http://www.google.com"));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("HttpClient requesting...");Di2015NewLine        var response = await client.SendAsync(request);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(response.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().Result.Substring(0,100));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("HttpClient done");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void UseWebClient()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("=== WebClient ==");Di2015NewLine        var webClient = new WebClient();Di2015NewLine        webClient.DownloadStringAsync(new Uri("http://www.google.com"));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("WebClient requesting...");Di2015NewLine        webClient.DownloadStringCompleted += (sender, eventArgs) => Console.WriteLine(eventArgs.Result.Substring(0,100));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("WebClient done.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16751613Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string file1;Di2015NewLineprivate DataTable dt;Di2015NewLineprivate int iTotalLinesOfFile;Di2015NewLineprivate void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        OpenFileDialog thisDialog = new OpenFileDialog();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (thisDialog.ShowDialog() == DialogResult.OK)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(dt==null) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dt== new DataTable();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dt.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            file1 = thisDialog.FileName;Di2015NewLine            textBox1.Text=file1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            iTotalLinesOfFile = System.IO.File.ReadAllLines(file1).Length;Di2015NewLine            //background workerDi2015NewLine            backgroundWorker1.DoWork += new DoWorkEventHandler(backgroundWorker1_DoWork);Di2015NewLine            backgroundWorker1.ProgressChanged += new ProgressChangedEventHandler(backgroundWorker1_ProgressChanged);Di2015NewLine            backgroundWorker1.RunWorkerCompleted += new RunWorkerCompletedEventHandler(backgroundWorker1_RunWorkerCompleted);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (backgroundWorker1.IsBusy != true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                backgroundWorker1.RunWorkerAsync(); //when you call this the DoWork will start and the code will continue!!Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //do not let the user to click the button again!!Di2015NewLine            button1.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine            //you will use this code if you want to cancel the job that Worker does.Di2015NewLine            //if (backgroundWorker1.WorkerSupportsCancellation == true)Di2015NewLine            //{Di2015NewLine            //    backgroundWorker1.CancelAsync();Di2015NewLine            //} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine private void backgroundWorker1_DoWork(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine        DataRow dr = null;   Di2015NewLine        using (System.IO.StreamReader file = new System.IO.StreamReader(file1))Di2015NewLine            {           Di2015NewLine                string line=String.Empty;Di2015NewLine                int lineno = 0;                    Di2015NewLine                int count = 0;Di2015NewLine                while ((line = file.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (line.Contains("DISKXFER"))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        backgroundWorker1.ReportProgress(count);Di2015NewLine                        string dataLine = line.ToString();Di2015NewLine                        string[] split = dataLine.Split(',');Di2015NewLine                        int result = split.Length;Di2015NewLine                        if (lineno == 0)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            for (int x = 0; x < result; x++)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                DataColumn dcss = new DataColumn(x.ToString(), Type.GetType("System.String"));Di2015NewLine                                dt.Columns.Add(dcss);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            if (dt.Rows.Count <= lineno)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                dr = dt.NewRow();Di2015NewLine                                dt.Rows.Add(dr);                                    Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            dr = dt.Rows[lineno];                                Di2015NewLine                            for (int x = 0; x < result; x++)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                dr[x+1] = split[x];Di2015NewLine                            }                                Di2015NewLine                        }                                Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if (dt.Rows.Count <= lineno)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                dr = dt.NewRow();Di2015NewLine                                dt.Rows.Add(dr);                                    Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            dr = dt.Rows[lineno];                               Di2015NewLine                            for (int x = 0; x < result; x++)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                dr[x+1] = split[x];Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        }                            Di2015NewLine                        lineno += 1;                        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    count += 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void bw_RunWorkerCompleted(object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.DataSource = dt;Di2015NewLine        button1.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void backgroundWorker1_ProgressChanged(object sender, ProgressChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int iCount = e.ProgressPercentage;Di2015NewLine        if(iTotalLinesOfFile==0) return;Di2015NewLine        //progressBar1.Value must not be less than 0 and more than 100Di2015NewLine        progressBar1.Value = (iCount / iTotalLinesOfFile) * 100;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16752626Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Preconditions:Di2015NewLine  // * items is a sequence of non-negative monotone increasing integersDi2015NewLine  // * n is the number of items to be in the subsequenceDi2015NewLine  // * sum is the desired sum of that subsequence.Di2015NewLine  // Result:Di2015NewLine  // A sequence of subsequences of the original sequence where each Di2015NewLine  // subsequence has n items and the given sum.Di2015NewLine  static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<int>> M(IEnumerable<int> items, int sum, int n)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Let's start by taking some easy outs. If the sum is negativeDi2015NewLine    // then there is no solution. If the number of items in theDi2015NewLine    // subsequence is negative then there is no solution.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (sum < 0 || n < 0)Di2015NewLine      yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If the number of items in the subsequence is zero thenDi2015NewLine    // the only possible solution is if the sum is zero.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (n == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (sum == 0)Di2015NewLine        yield return Enumerable.Empty<int>();Di2015NewLine      yield break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If the number of items is less than the required number of Di2015NewLine    // items, there is no solution.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (items.Count() < n)Di2015NewLine      yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We have at least n items in the sequence, andDi2015NewLine    // and n is greater than zero, so First() is valid:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int first = items.First();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We need n items from a monotone increasing subsequenceDi2015NewLine    // that have a particular sum. We might already be too Di2015NewLine    // large to meet that requirement:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (n * first > sum)Di2015NewLine      yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // There might be some solutions that involve the first element.Di2015NewLine    // Find them all.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(var subsequence in M(items.Skip(1), sum - first, n - 1))Di2015NewLine      yield return new[]{first}.Concat(subsequence);      Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // And there might be some solutions that do not involve the first element.Di2015NewLine    // Find them all.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(var subsequence in M(items.Skip(1), sum, n))Di2015NewLine      yield return subsequence;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  static void Main()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    int[] x = {0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5};Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i <= 15; ++i)Di2015NewLine      foreach(var seq in M(x, i, 4))Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("({0}) SUM {1}", string.Join(",", seq), i);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}       Di2015NewLine
16752626Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineabstract class ImmutableList<T> : IEnumerable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public static readonly ImmutableList<T> Empty = new EmptyList();Di2015NewLine  private ImmutableList() {}  Di2015NewLine  public abstract bool IsEmpty { get; }Di2015NewLine  public abstract T Head { get; }Di2015NewLine  public abstract ImmutableList<T> Tail { get; }Di2015NewLine  public ImmutableList<T> Push(T newHead)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return new List(newHead, this);Di2015NewLine  }  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private sealed class EmptyList : ImmutableList<T>Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    public override bool IsEmpty { get { return true; } }Di2015NewLine    public override T Head { get { throw new InvalidOperationException(); } }Di2015NewLine    public override ImmutableList<T> Tail { get { throw new InvalidOperationException(); } }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  private sealed class List : ImmutableList<T>Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    private readonly T head;Di2015NewLine    private readonly ImmutableList<T> tail;Di2015NewLine    public override bool IsEmpty { get { return false; } }Di2015NewLine    public override T Head { get { return head; } }Di2015NewLine    public override ImmutableList<T> Tail { get { return tail; } }Di2015NewLine    public List(T head, ImmutableList<T> tail)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      this.head = head;Di2015NewLine      this.tail = tail;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  System.Collections.IEnumerator System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return this.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public IEnumerator<T> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    for (ImmutableList<T> current = this; !current.IsEmpty; current = current.Tail)Di2015NewLine      yield return current.Head;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Preconditions:Di2015NewLine  // * items is a sequence of non-negative monotone increasing integersDi2015NewLine  // * n is the number of items to be in the subsequenceDi2015NewLine  // * sum is the desired sum of that subsequence.Di2015NewLine  // Result:Di2015NewLine  // A sequence of subsequences of the original sequence where each Di2015NewLine  // subsequence has n items and the given sum.Di2015NewLine  static IEnumerable<ImmutableList<int>> M(ImmutableList<int> items, int sum, int n)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Let's start by taking some easy outs. If the sum is negativeDi2015NewLine    // then there is no solution. If the number of items in theDi2015NewLine    // subsequence is negative then there is no solution.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (sum < 0 || n < 0)Di2015NewLine      yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If the number of items in the subsequence is zero thenDi2015NewLine    // the only possible solution is if the sum is zero.Di2015NewLine    if (n == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (sum == 0)Di2015NewLine        yield return ImmutableList<int>.Empty;Di2015NewLine      yield break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If the number of items is less than the required number of Di2015NewLine    // items, there is no solution.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (items.Count() < n)Di2015NewLine      yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We have at least n items in the sequence, andDi2015NewLine    // and n is greater than zero.Di2015NewLine    int first = items.Head;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We need n items from a monotone increasing subsequenceDi2015NewLine    // that have a particular sum. We might already be too Di2015NewLine    // large to meet that requirement:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (n * first > sum)Di2015NewLine      yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // There might be some solutions that involve the first element.Di2015NewLine    // Find them all.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(var subsequence in M(items.Tail, sum - first, n - 1))Di2015NewLine      yield return subsequence.Push(first);      Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // And there might be some solutions that do not involve the first element.Di2015NewLine    // Find them all.Di2015NewLine    foreach(var subsequence in M(items.Tail, sum, n))Di2015NewLine      yield return subsequence;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  static void Main()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    ImmutableList<int> x = ImmutableList<int>.Empty.Push(5).Di2015NewLine                           Push(4).Push(3).Push(2).Push(1).Push(0);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i <= 15; ++i)Di2015NewLine      foreach(var seq in M(x, i, 4))Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("({0}) SUM {1}", string.Join(",", seq), i);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}       Di2015NewLine

16753186Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing NodaTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LocalDate start = new LocalDate(2013, 3, 3);Di2015NewLine        LocalDate end = new LocalDate(2013, 5, 25);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Defaults to years, months and days - but you can changeDi2015NewLine        // that by specifying a PeriodUnits value.Di2015NewLine        Period period = Period.Between(start, end);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} years, {1} months, {2} days",Di2015NewLine                          period.Years, period.Months, period.Days);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

This enables animation, styling, binding, etc...Di2015NewLine    public static readonly DependencyProperty AgeProperty =Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.Register(Di2015NewLine        "Age",  //Must be the same name as the property created aboveDi2015NewLine        typeof(int), //Must be the same type as the property created aboveDi2015NewLine        typeof(Person), //Must be the same as the owner classDi2015NewLine        new UIPropertyMetadata(Di2015NewLine            0,  //default value, must be of the same type as the propertyDi2015NewLine            new PropertyChangedCallback((s, e) =>  //A callback that gets executed when the property changedDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var source = s as Person;Di2015NewLine                s.DOB_Year = DateTime.Now.Year - s.Age; Di2015NewLine            })));Di2015NewLine

16758607Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction isDate(txtDate) {Di2015NewLine    var currVal = txtDate;Di2015NewLine    if (currVal == '')Di2015NewLine       return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  //Declare Regex  Di2015NewLine  var rxDatePattern = /^(\\d{1,2})(\\/|-)(\\d{1,2})(\\/|-)(\\d{4})$/;Di2015NewLine  var dtArray = currVal.match(rxDatePattern); // is format OK?Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (dtArray == null)Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //Checks for dd/mm/yyyy format.Di2015NewLine   var dtDay = dtArray[1];Di2015NewLine   var dtMonth = dtArray[3];Di2015NewLine   var dtYear = dtArray[5];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (dtMonth < 1 || dtMonth > 12)Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine  else if (dtDay < 1 || dtDay > 31)Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine  else if ((dtMonth == 4 || dtMonth == 6 || dtMonth == 9 || dtMonth == 11) && dtDay == 31)Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine  else if (dtMonth == 2) {Di2015NewLine      var isleap = (dtYear % 4 == 0 && (dtYear % 100 != 0 || dtYear % 400 == 0));Di2015NewLine      if (dtDay > 29 || (dtDay == 29 && !isleap))Di2015NewLine          return false;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
